column2: The Kingdom of Tennessee

The state of Tennessee was originally part of the Carolinas, and was under American control for centuries, barring a brief period of rebellion, before the Deluge occurred and its population fell to heathenry. Finally, the state is once again firmly under civilized American control.\n\nWith Tennessee back in Christian hands, it is only a matter of time before all of Appalachia will be truly Christian once more. The rest of America is watching, as I am the forerunner of what is to come.
The King has entered the building!
The Principality of West Virginia

The mountains of West Virginia stand at the precipice of the Northeast, and with its return to the fold of Christianity, the roads to the ancient capital are that much more secure.

I have raised the new banner of West Virginia for the first time, and I look east to the lands of Virginia and Maryland. For too long, those lands were controlled by the enemies of the cross, but no more.

This is just the first of many victories. Everything will return to [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] hands.
Take me home, country roads...
The Confederacy Restored

Once more the grand Confederate banners of Charleston have been raised. [From.GetDynName] has restored the old crown lands of the Confederacy, and the Southern Empire rises from the ashes of defeat, to conquer its old enemies in both the north and the south.

The Holy Columbian Confederacy suffered defeat after defeat, finally falling to the throng of hostile states at its borders. But like the America of old, its enemies could not keep it from growing in power and becoming a relevant actor once more.

The Holy Columbian Confederacy is under god and indivisible. All hail [From.GetTitledName]!
I will serve the true leader of America!
An undeserving false President.
Not this again!
Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.

Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
It feels me with hope and dedication towards the future, to once more see the Confederate banners raised. If it would please you, I would do my utmost to serve you in these challenging times to come.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

After gathering the lands of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] under [From.GetHerHis] rule, [From.GetDynName] has declared [From.GetHerselfHimself] the Grand [From.GetDukeDuchessCap] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] in a grand ceremony that is sure to be remembered for many years to come.\n\nThe rest of the Princes of the Confederacy look to [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] with jealousy, as [From.GetTitledFirstName] will surely play an important role in the Confederacy with [From.GetHerHis] newfound rank.
Start preparing a campaign against the heathens in Mexico, to reconquer parts of the Mexican Empire for the Sacred Heart. A large undertaking like this can usually only be done once a lifetime.
Find a fitting dynasty member to become a beneficiary for my reconquests in Mexico.
Set §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! as a beneficiary for my reconquests in Mexico.
§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! will no longer be my beneficiary for the Reconquest of Mexico.
I can sell my services against the other Saint Cultists for a sum of money, if §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! is willing to pay.
I can ask §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! for help against the other Saint Cultist invaders, in return for a small sum of money.
Mexican Blood of [Root.GetFirstName]
Known for both fighting against and helping the heathens throughout the Reconquests of Mexico, as one of the greatest generals of our times.
Mexican Blood of [Root.GetFirstName]
Known for being one of the most important characters in the reconquests of the Mexican Empire.
It seems I have waited too long, as my men and all my preparation starts to come apart. It seems people lost faith in my plans, when I did not start any wars for Mexico.

Magnanimous [Root.GetTitledName]

Your plans to reconquer Mexico for the Saints inspires me to take up arms as well, and I will support your efforts to the best of my ability.

Your ally,
[From.GetTitledName]

After leading troops on both sides of the wars raging throughout the Empire of Mexico, I seem to have grown quite the reputation among the local peasants and soldiers on both sides.

Though some would consider me a mercenary or a traitor to the faith, my prowess in war has made me a hero among most, and revered among the populace. Some would even go as far as to call me a folk hero.

Surely, my actions must have been righteous, seeing all the responses. I have often wondered if it would all be worth it in the end, and it is a joyous occasion to see all my hard work has paid off.
The Mexican Hero

I have fought for the faith several times these recent years, to recapture the Empire of Mexico  as a true vanguard for the Saints and their followers.

Though we were once defeated by the Indios, who had reasserted their ancient heathen beliefs in the chaos after the Event, we have once again brought them under the rule of the Saints. Step by step, we have regained what is rightfully ours.

The Empire of Mexico will rise as a bastion of the Saints once more. We will make sure of it.

To the greedy [Root.GetTitledName]

Your despicable offer disgusts me. I hope to see you at the battlefield next, so I can cut you down together with the rest of the heathens.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]

Your prowess in war is well known throughout Mexico, and I would like to offer your a sum of gold for your services in the current Reconquest War.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

There will probably be men showing up to fight for the faith in the upcoming wars for Mexico, but I could invest some money into spreading the message far and wide to attract more well trained troops.

A year has passed since I started my preparations for the reconquest of Mexico, and I am sure that whoever wanted to take part in the reconquest would have arrived by now. Now all that remains is to find a place to point my newfound allies towards.
The Mexican Reconquest

As the last in a long line of attempts to try to reconquer the Empire of Mexico, [From.GetTitledName] has begun preparing [From.GetHerHis] troops and looking for allies for a new Mexican campaign. Trying to restore parts of Mesoamerica to the Saints, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has spent a noticeable amount of resources and sent out a call to gather troops from all around the region.\n\nWith the Saint Cultists planning for war, the other faiths have started assembling their troops to defend themselves. It is only a matter of months, or maybe a year, before the two sides will clash together once more, desperately trying to claw their way to more land in Mexico.
Mexico belongs to the Saints!
The Christian rabble does not belong here.
Rise of Mexico

With the rise of the [e_mexico.GetFullName], the Empire of Mexico has once again come under total control of the [From.Religion.GetGroupName]. There was a long struggle between the different faiths occupying the region, but the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] believers have finally conquered their adversaries.\n\nWith the struggle of the two sides finally put to rest, Mexico can finally start looking forward to a peaceful future, free of the wars that have raged through Mesoamerica.
Mexico will be the center of our faith.
End of the Reconquest

Not even Istmo has been safe from the Saint Cultist reconquest of Mexico. The final bastions of the other faiths in the region has fallen, now only the Saints left.\n\nWith Mexico finally restored to the faithful, the reconquest of the empire has ended, and peace has been restored. Once more the center of the faith, Mexico will surely play an important role in the region.

A minor noble has launched a campaign to start gathering troops to reconquer parts of Mexico. [From.GetTitledFirstName] asks for my help in supporting [From.GetHerHim], and taking part in the reconquest. This is a great opportunity to push back the heathens from Mexico.
Ursuline War for [Title.GetBaseName]
$ORDER$ Ursuline War for $OTHER_TITLE$
§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! can use this casus belli to attack §Y$TARGET$§! over §Y$TITLE$§! as part of the Lacustrine Crusade to convert the pagans of the Great Lakes.
A large group of peasants and children, led by a [Root.GetBoyGirl] claiming to hear the voice of Christ, has embarked into a desperate mission to reconquer the ancient capital from the infidels.
Trick [childrens_crusade_leader.GetFirstName] and [childrens_crusade_leader.GetHerHis] supporters and have them sold into servitude to the heathens.

I have received a vision from the Holy Ghost.\nOur Lord has ordered me to take up arms, rally the faithful and march on the ancient Capital to take it away from the vile grasp of the infidels desecrating its hallowed grounds.

By permanently getting rid of [From.GetFirstName], I have ensured that [From.GetHerHis] misguided attempt to lead a Crusade to the ancient capital will never come to pass. All the children and peasants who had flocked to the banner of this [From.GetBoyGirl] have scattered to the four winds. They lament the loss of their beloved leader, still unable to grasp why would God allow [From.GetHerHim] to meet an untimely end before accomplishing [From.GetHerHis] divine task.\nAs unfortunate as [From.GetFirstName]'s fate was, it has undoubtedly saved the lives of countless people, who would have otherwise followed the child into the maws of certain doom at the hands of the infidels.

I feared that my [GetFromRelation]'s desire to free the ancient capital would lead [From.GetHerHim] to an unfortunate end.\n[From.GetFirstName] is gone. All the children and peasants who had flocked to [From.GetHerHis] banner have scattered to the four winds. They lament the loss of their beloved leader, still unable to grasp why would God allow [From.GetHerHim] to be killed before accomplishing [From.GetHerHis] divine task.\nYet, I can at least take the solace in the fact that, as unfortunate as [From.GetFirstName]'s death was, it has undoubtedly saved the lives of countless people, who would have otherwise followed the child into the maws of certain doom at the hands of the infidels.

With the death of [From.GetFirstName], [From.GetHerHis] misguided attempt to lead a Crusade to the ancient capital will never come to pass. All the children and peasants who had flocked to the banner of this [From.GetBoyGirl] have scattered to the four winds. They lament the loss of their beloved leader, still unable to grasp why would God allow [From.GetHerHim] to be killed before accomplishing [From.GetHerHis] divine task.\nAs unfortunate as [From.GetFirstName]'s death was, it has undoubtedly saved the lives of countless people, who would have otherwise followed the child into the maws of certain doom at the hands of the infidels.

By capturing [From.GetFirstName], I have put a stop to [From.GetHerHis] misguided attempt to lead a Crusade to the ancient capital.\n\nThe child languished in my dungeons, and [From.GetHerHis] foolish followers have already started to scatter to the four winds, unable to fathom why God would allow their beloved leader to be stopped so easily.

With the untimely capture of [From.GetFirstName] by [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], the [From.GetBoyGirl]'s attempt to lead a horde of zealots to recapture the ancient capital for Christendom has been foiled. The child's followers have swiftly scattered to the four winds after the loss of their beloved leader, unable to comprehend why God would allow [From.GetFirstName] to be stopped so easily before succeeding in [From.GetHerHis] divine quest.

Something has happened to my beloved [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName].

[From.GetSheHeCap] claims that the Holy Ghost visited [From.GetHerHim] last night, ordering [From.GetHerHim] to take up arms, gather all the true followers and lead a Crusade against the infidels who are desecrating the hallowed soil of Washington.

[From.GetSheHeCap] has even had the gall to demand money, weapons and troops from me to show my support to this sacred quest of [From.GetHersHis]. [From.GetSheHeCap] will not listen to reason and is very determined to leave [Root.Capital.GetName] immediately.

[From.GetFirstName], a child from [Root.Capital.GetName] has caused quite the commotion today, when [From.GetSheHe] demanded an audience with me, claiming that the Holy Ghost appeared to [From.GetHerHim] in dream last night, ordering [From.GetHerHim] to take up arms, gather all the true followers of Christ and lead a Crusade to free the ancient capital.\n\n[From.GetSheHeCap] concluded [From.GetHerHis] sermon by commanding me to provide [From.GetHerHim] with money, weapons and men to help [From.GetHerHim] fight against the infidels in the name of Our Lord.

News have reached us that a [FromFrom.GetBoyGirl] from [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] has received a vision from the Holy Ghost, compelling [FromFrom.GetHerHim] to pick up arms, gather the true followers of Christ and lead a Crusade against the infidels who desecrate the sacred soil of Washington.\nThe [FromFrom.GetBoyGirl] has gathered many followers amongst the peasantry and has embarked on great journey to reach the ancient capital, claiming that the sea itself will open at [FromFrom.GetHerHis] passage.
Perhaps the Lord does not wish them to reach Washington...
The Unshifting River

[From.GetFirstName] claimed that the Mississippi River would reverse its course for [From.GetHerHis] army, allowing [From.GetHerHis] warriors to quickly sail all the way to the ancient capital.\nUnfortunately, the Lord did not fulfill the promise made to the young Crusader, and now the large force of peasants and children languishes in St. Louis, looking for a way to travel to the Northeast.\nSome of the less determined members of the Crusade have already lost their faith, but [From.GetFirstName] remains strong in [From.GetHerHis] conviction, persuading new, hopeless recruits every day.
The Coasts of Lake Michigan

After having finally managed to book a passage up the Mississippi River in order to reach the ancient capital, the Children's Crusade has been forced to an unfortunate detour to Chicago after their ships were forced to turn back from Lake Michigan after a terrible storm. Reports from the army are scant, although there are rumors saying that many have started to doubt [From.GetFirstName]'s leadership. \n\nAnd yet, this unlikely horde of youths and peasants is still marching on towards Washington.
The Children at Buffalo

Despite all adversities and many attempts to undermine [From.GetHerHis] divinely-inspired leadership, [From.GetFirstName] has been able to march [From.GetHerHis] army all the way to Buffalo. \nWith the ancient capital finally within reach, the Crusaders' resolve has been strengthened. Their leader is certain that the infidels will not dare to raise their arms against them once they realize their holy mandate, and instead will open the doors of Washington at their very arrival.

Despite all adversities and many attempts to undermine [From.GetHerHis] divinely-inspired leadership, [From.GetFirstName] has been able to march [From.GetHerHis] army all the way to Buffalo. \nWith the ancient capital finally within reach, the Crusaders' resolve has been strengthened. \n[From.GetFirstName] has sent me a message, thanking me for my continued support during the campaign, and asking me any further help I am able to provide [From.GetHerHim] with in order to prevail against the infidels. With my help and God's blessing, [From.GetSheHe] is certain of victory against the abominable heathens.
The Angels in New York

After receiving a vision of the Archangel Gabriel, who helped [From.GetHerHim] lead [From.GetHerHis] army through the treacherous path leading to the Potomac, the children of [From.GetFirstName] have miraculously managed to reach New York before being spotted by the infidels.\nIn spite of the [From.GetBoyGirl]'s claim that the infidels would forsake the Devil upon their very arrival without the need for a fight, the heathens occupying Washington have begun mobilizing their army, ready and eager to slaughter the innocent souls marching against them, in order to protect their ill-gotten land.\nThe world will soon see whether [From.GetFirstName] was truly blessed by the Lord.

After receiving a vision of the Archangel Gabriel, who helped [From.GetHerHim] lead [From.GetHerHis] army through the treacherous path leading to the Potomac, the children of [From.GetFirstName] have miraculously managed to reach New York before being spotted by the infidels.\nIn spite of the [From.GetBoyGirl]'s claim that the infidels would forsake the Devil upon their very arrival without the need for a fight, the heathens occupying Washington have begun mobilizing their army, ready and eager to slaughter the innocent souls marching against them.\nThe world will soon see whether [From.GetFirstName] was truly blessed by the Lord, or if I was unwise to put my trust in this child.

Facing against the concrete threat of a heathen army, the Children's Crusade shattered in a thousand crying pieces.\nWithout proper leadership, equipment, or trained soldiers, [From.GetFirstName] was unable to stand against [From.GetHerHis] foes. Despite being able to lead [From.GetHerHis] followers all the way to the ancient capital, [From.GetHerHis] dreams of a Christian Washington will go unfulfilled.\nAbandoned by most of [From.GetHerHis] supporters, the [From.GetBoyGirl] has been sold into servitude, alongside many other children captured by the infidels after their defeat.

An insane child, clearly under the influence of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], has managed to reach Washington at the head of a large army of beggars and youths, claiming that it is [From.GetHerHis] sacred duty to retake the ancient capital in the name of [From.GetHerHis] god.\nWhile the number of gullible fools who have fallen for this [From.GetBoyGirl]'s words is alarming, the idea that a mob of starving peasants will be capable of defeating a mighty [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] army in open battle is laughable.

Facing against the concrete threat of a heathen army, the Children's Crusade shattered in a thousand crying pieces.\nWithout proper leadership, equipment, or trained soldiers, [From.GetFirstName] was unable to stand against [From.GetHerHis] foes. Despite being able to lead [From.GetHerHis] followers all the way to the ancient capital, [From.GetHerHis] dreams of a Christian Washington will go unfulfilled.\nThe heathens slaughtered all of the adults who were foolish enough to follow [From.GetHerHim] and captured the children in the army, selling all of them as slaves.

As was expected, the fools who entrusted their lives in the hands of a child were promptly slaughtered by the armies of the faithful.\nThis Crusade against Washington was bound to be short-lived and one-sided. Our enemies had no skilled commanders, no weapons, no armors, no siege engines, no food... That they were able to reach their destination in the first place was something of a miracle by itself.\nThe few survivors amongst the children have been sold into servitude, never to return to their homeland.

Against all odds, the children of Christ have succeeded in their misbegotten quest to reconquer Washington! \nHosts of archangels with shining armor and flaming swords have been reported to have descended upon the walls of the ancient capital during the final battle, smiting the infidels, turning the defenders' weapons into rust and melting their eyes out.\nA child now rules from the White House, and few doubt that it was through divine intervention that [From.GetSheHe] was put there.

Against all odds, the children of Christ have succeeded in their unlikely quest to reconquer Washington! \nHosts of archangels with shining armor and flaming swords have been reported to have descended upon the walls of the ancient capital during the final battle, smiting the infidels, turning the defenders' weapons into rust and melting their eyes out.\n[From.GetFirstName] now rules from the White House, and few doubt that it was through divine intervention that [From.GetSheHe] was put there.
The Maritimer Ship

I am strolling through the streets of [Root.Capital.GetName] when I notice the throngs of people rushing down to the harbor. Somewhat curious what might have happened, I tell my retainers we will make our way down there as well.

A grand ship unlike any I have ever seen is docked by the port, several [From.Culture.GetGroupName] flags hanging from the masts. I can see several guards rushing about the deck, as they are helping someone off the boat. As the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.Capital.GetName], it is only right that I am the one to greet them.

An impressive looking [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitle] makes [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetHerHis] way off the ship, instantly locking eyes with me. With a smile, [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetSheHe] takes my hand and says "My [Root.GetLordLady], I need your help."

It has been some time since [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitledName] came to my court, and it has certainly been quite the experience having [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetHerHim] around. However, today [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetSheHe] came to talk to me about putting [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetHerHim] on the throne of the Maritimes.\n\n"My dear [Root.GetLordLady], I know you have had your disagreements with the Empire. And of course, you would be well paid..." [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetSheHeCap] tells me. With some of the money I would receive from [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitledName], I could join the ongoing preparations for the Crusade and convince the other members to make this part of our goal.

In a passionate speech [From.GetTitledName] explains how all of us must gather our men to support [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitledName] for the throne of [k_maritimes.GetName]. The Emperors of [k_maritimes.GetName] have for a long time looked down upon the rest of us, even as they rule over the ancient Acadian homeland. Now it is time to show them that we can overthrow the false Emperor in their midst as well.\n\nWith the gifts sent by [From.GetTitledName], [From.GetSheHe] has managed to convince the rest of the [From.Religion.GetName] realm to target Nova Scotia as part of the next Crusade.
column3: Dans un discours passionné, [From.Get_le_TitledName] explique à quel point nous nous devons de rassembler nos hommes pour soutenir [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.Get_le_TitledName] pour le trône de [e_byzantium.GetName]. Les empereurs de [e_byzantium.GetName] ont longtemps méprisé le reste d'entre nous, prétendant être les descendants des Romains. Maintenant il est temps de leur montrer que nous pouvons aussi renverser leur faux empereur.\n\nLes cadeaux envoyés par [From.Get_le_TitledName] ont réussi à convaincre le reste du pays [From.GetReligionMasc] de cibler Constantinople dans le cadre de la prochaine croisade.
column4: In einer leidenschaftlichen Rede erklärte [From.GetTitledName], wie wir alle unsere Männer versammeln müssen, um [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitledName] dabei zu unterstützen, den Thron von [e_byzantium.GetName] für sich zu beanspruchen. Die Kaiser von [e_byzantium.GetName] haben lange Zeit auf uns herab gesehen und vorgetäuscht, Nachfahren der Römer zu sein. Jetzt ist die Zeit gekommen um ihnen zu zeigen, dass wir auch den falschen Kaiser in ihrer Mitte stürzen können.\n\nMit den Geschenken, die  [From.GetTitledName] geschickt hat, konnte [From.GetSheHe] auch den Rest des [From.Religion.GetName]en Reiches davon überzeugen Konstantinopel als Ziel des nächsten Kreuzzugs anzugreifen.
column6: Con un discurso apasionado, [From.GetTitledName] explica cómo debemos reunir a nuestros hombres para apoyar a [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitledName] para el trono de [e_byzantium.GetName]. Sus emperadores nos han despreciado durante mucho tiempo, fingiendo ser descendientes de los romanos. Es hora de mostrarles que también podemos echar al falso emperador que tienen.\n\nCon los regalos que [From.GetTitledName] ha enviado, ha conseguido conseguir al resto del mundo [From.Religion.GetName] para hacer de Constantinopla el objetivo de la próxima cruzada.

column2: To Nova Scotia!
Crusade for The Maritimes

The Crusaders are leaving the [From.Religion.GetName] realm, their eyes towards Nova Scotia and [k_maritimes.GetName]. At the same time, the Abbess-General has made an enraged speech about the vices of men and how the good faithful have been led astray. She threatens every single Crusader with excommunication from the church, but the Crusaders continue onwards towards the ancient capital at the Bay of Fundy.\n\nWhat was once the bastion of the Anglican faith is now desperately protecting itself, and [k_maritimes.Holder.GetTitledName] is looking for any help [k_maritimes.Holder.GetSheHe] can get.
We will take Acadia!

Nova Scotia falls to great cheers from the [From.Religion.GetName] Crusaders. The rest of the world weeps as the very center of the Anglican faith is shattered. The former King [FromFrom.GetDynName] has run off to [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] to try and restore what remains of his birthright.

[Root.GetByzantineRefugeeText]Now [k_acadia.Holder.GetTitledFirstName] sits on the throne in the Maritimes. [k_acadia.Holder.GetSheHeCap] has declared [k_acadia.Holder.GetHerselfHimself] the new ruler of a reborn Acadia, and will rule with both Gallic and Anglo-Saxon traditions in mind.

Only time will tell, if the [From.Religion.GetName]s will be remembered as the ones who broke the Anglican Bulwark, or the ones who restored Acadia to greatness.
In the middle of the fighting, [byzantine_refugee.GetDynName], the [From.Religion.GetName]-sponsored pretender to the Maritimer throne, died.
Our homeland is ours once more!
Lacustrine Crusade Target
You can ask St. Ursula's Chosen to target a pagan ruler for their lacustrine campaigns
Lacustrine Crusade
There is currently an ongoing war between the Ursulines and the pagans
Lacustrine Crusade

The Ursulines march towards [northern_crusade_kingdom_title.GetAdjective] lands, to secure it for Christianity. The pagans have had too long to convert peacefully, now they will be taken by the sword.

Their first goal is to take out [northern_crusade_target_character.GetTitledFirstName], the warlord of [northern_crusade_target_character.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName]. If they secure [northern_crusade_target_character.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName], they will use it as a base to quell the rest of the [northern_crusade_kingdom_title.GetAdjective] lands.

The blood of the pagans will flow through the Great Lakes, no mercy will be shown.
Forward, women of God!

To the esteemed [Root.GetTitledName]

The St. Ursula's Chosen thanks you for your aid throughout the war for [northern_crusade_title.GetBaseName].

Signed,

To the esteemed [Root.GetTitledName]

The St. Ursula's Chosen thanks you for your aid throughout the war for [northern_crusade_title.GetBaseName]. We have sent you a small gift to show our appreciation for your assistance.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
The St. Ursula's Chosen Failure

After repeated tries to pacify the south, the St. Ursula's Chosen have finally given up. At every turn, the pagans of the lakes have come together to protect their way of life.

As the St. Ursula's Chosen finally renounced their Crusade against the pagans, the other Christians in the east will surely have a harder task at hand. With their opponents leaving, the pagans look to the east for potential new expansion.

The rest of the world awaits the pagan fury. The unquelled rampage of the north will surely come soon.
What did the Ursulines do!?
The Ursulines Alliance

A large honor guard of the Ursulines appear outside of [Root.Capital.GetName], led by [From.GetTitledName] [From.GetHerselfHimself]. In response to my aid in their latest wars, they have decided to award me and all my descendants the honor of friendship with the St. Ursula's Chosen.\n\nForevermore, the Order will stay by our side as valiant knights and friends, if we should ever need them.
Raise the Pontifical Rustish Guards
The words of the Founders intrigue me...
The religions of the Pacific are more to my liking.
The coastal religions are intriguing.
The coastal religions are intriguing.
Still not interested... perhaps the Christian offshots would be best?
I am still searching...
Perhaps the Cult of Saints has what I seek?
Perhaps the Cult of Saints has what I seek?
Perhaps [cult_of_saints.GetName] has what I seek?.
The Angel Moroni has the answers!
The answers lie with [latter_day_saints.GetName]!
I should start from the beginning again...

Take some time to study the ruins and accounts of the ancient Americans.
I wish to learn about their culture and customs.

I did my best, but my attempts to study the history of the United States were not as successful as I hoped. Most accounts I was able to access are fragmented and confusing. I don't think I was able to learn anything valuable after all these months of study.

The more I read about ancient America, the more convinced I become that they did not worship [catholic.GetHighGodName], but the Founding Fathers. Their monuments and suriving literature provide seemingly-irrefutable evidence of this, despite what I have been taught.

In these past months I have immersed myself in the fragmented accounts of Washington's military exploits against the Redcoats. It has been an enlightening learning experience and I am sure that, despite the difference in equipment and sizes, I can apply some of his tactics against my own enemies.

In these past months I have immersed myself in the fragmented accounts of some of America's greatest statesmen. Reading the works of Hamilton and of his reformation of the American legal code in particular has been an eye-opening experience for me.

In these past months I have immersed myself in the fragmented accounts of some of America's finest orators. Reading through the speeches of Adams and other great politicians has allowed me to learn a lot about the fine art of diplomacy and politics.
Washington's Insight
This ruler has spent a long time studying the accounts and writings of Washington's military exploits in order to refine [Root.GetHerHis] military skills.
Adams' Insight
This ruler has spent a long time studying the orations of Adams and other famous Classical politicians in order to better learn the art of diplomacy and sophistry.
Hamilton's Insight
This ruler has spent a long time studying the accounts and writings of Hamilton in order to acquire a deeper understanding of statecraft and American law.
Favored by Washington
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to Washington, the first and greatest among the Founding Fathers.
Favored by Roosevelt
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to Roosevelt, the President renowned for his many feats of valor.
Favored by Jefferson
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to Jefferson, the Founding Father associated with expansion and commerce.
Favored by Lincoln
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to Lincoln, the wise and humble President who reunited America.

Many gods inhabit the [Root.Religion.GetName] pantheon, but it would be only right to dedicate such an important temple as [scoped_temple_barony.GetName] to one of the four whose likenesses are reflected on Mount Rushmore.
This temple belongs to Washington.
Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of the four Rushmore Presidents: §YWashington§!.
Let Roosevelt consecrate this temple!
Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of the four Rushmore Presidents: §YRoosevelt§!.
This is the home of Jefferson.
Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of the four Rushmore Presidents: §YJefferson§!.
Lincoln will inhabit this temple.
Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of the four Rushmore Presidents: §YLincoln§!.

Washington is the undisputed greatest deity in the Americanist pantheon. He was the one who drove the Redcoats across the sea before taking the mantle of President. Astonishingly, it is said that he gave up his divine powers in order to die peacefully, demonstrating a superhuman strength of character.
This shall be Washington's temple!

Roosevelt has always been a very popular deity amongst Americanists. He is renowned for his feats of derring-do, such as regularly slaughtering bears for sport, exploring a gigantic uncharted swamp far to the south, and singlehandedly building the Panama Canal.
This shall be Roosevelt's temple!

Jefferson is one of the Founding Fathers of the United States. It is said that he won America's first great war against the Brethren and oversaw America's expansion from sea to shining sea. Although he remains a controversial figure to some, he still stands pre-eminent in the Americanist pantheon.
This shall be Jefferson's temple!

Lincoln is commonly accepted as the greatest Americanist deity outside of the Founding Fathers, thanks to his great his wisdom and humility. Lincoln both vanquished the hated Confederacy and reformed the Americanist faith, revealing that all men are equally capable of worshiping the Founders.
This shall be Lincoln's temple!
The Fault in Our Stars

By carving this imposing World Tree, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and fierce gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By the construction of this sacred Serpent Shrine, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and mysterious gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By hewing our new Great Pillar from iron and steel, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and unyielding gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By carving this imposing Totem with the remains of our sacrifices, we have provided the gods with a great offering, buying us some reprieve from their terrible thirst for blood. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By carving this opulent shrine to the Queen, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By carving this great monument, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and benevolent gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

My brothers and sisters of [Root.Society.GetName] will gladly come to the help of a fellow [celitc_pagan_reformed.GetName] warrior in the time of need, rushing out of their sacred forests to prove their mettle and fight against the enemies of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
column3: Mes frères et soeurs [Root.Get_du_Society] viendront volontiers à l'aide à un guerrier de foi [finnish_pagan_reformed.GetName] au moment du besoin, se précipitant hors de leurs forêts sacrées pour prouver leur courage et se battre contre les ennemis [Root.PrimaryTitle.Get_du_Realm].
column4: Meine Brüder und Schwestern von [Root.Society.GetName] werden in Zeiten der Not gerne einem ihrer [finnish_pagan_reformed.GetName]en Brüder zur Hilfe eilen und aus ihren heiligen Wäldern kommen, um ihren Mit gegen die Feinde von [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] zeigen zu können.
column6: Mis hermanos de [Root.Society.GetName] vendrán gustosamente a ayudar a un camarada guerrero [finnish_pagan_reformed.GetName] cuando lo necesita, saliendo de los bosques sagrados para probar su valía y luchar contra los enemigos de [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

column2: As the [revelationist.GetName] mystics surround me, preparing my body and mind for the ritual, one of them asks me what do I wish to do with the power bestowed to me by [revelationist.GetHighGodName].

The local cult devoted to the saints of harvests are reveling in the continuous light rains over [rain_dance_province.GetName]. The good spirits can be noticed on everyone, from contented farmers and workers, to smug merchants and eager soldiers in the area.
the Antiquarian

The [crusade_title.GetAdjective] lands has long been under the tyrannic rule of the Antiquarian infidel [crusade_character.GetTitledName]. But with the upcoming [From.Religion.GetGroupName] onslaught, it is only a matter of time before [crusade_character.GetSheHe] will fall.

[new_crusade_most_participating_member.GetTitledFirstName] has taken most of the core lands in [new_crusade_title.GetBaseName] for [new_crusade_most_participating_member.GetHerselfHimself], to the annoyance of the other Crusaders. The [new_crusade_most_participating_member.GetProperReligiousHead] has made an announcement about the victory and selfishness of [new_crusade_most_participating_member.GetFirstName], talking about the vices and virtues of the faith.

[new_crusade_most_participating_member.GetTitledFirstName] has granted the new lands of [new_crusade_title.GetBaseName] to [crusade_king_recipient.GetDynName]. The [new_crusade_most_participating_member.GetProperReligiousHead] has made an announcement about the victory and virtues of the Crusaders, as true faithful protectors of the faith.
plain people
Charismatics
Anglicans
deviant Hussites

It has been at the fringes of [From.Religion.GetGroupName] lands for ages, and once again the [From.GetProperReligiousHead] has decided it is time to try and bring them into the fold, and turn the people of [crusade_title.GetName] to the true Faith.
column3: Cette terre a été à la périphérie des terres [From.GetReligiousGroupFem]s depuis des siècles et, une fois de plus, le Pape a décidé que le moment était venu d'amener ses habitants au sein de l'Église en les convertissant à la vraie foi.
column4: Es war seit Jahren am Rand der [From.Religion.GetGroupName]en Länder angesiedelt und der Papst beschlossen, dass die Zeit gekommen ist es wieder zur Herde zu bringen und das Volk von [crusade_title.GetName] zum wahren Glauben zu bringen.
column6: Lleva años al borde de las tierras [From.Religion.GetGroupName] y el papa ha decidido que es hora de meterlo en el redil y convertir al pueblo de [crusade_title.GetName] a la fe verdadera.

column2: It has never been a part of the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] realms, but the [From.GetProperReligiousHead] has decided it is time to bring them into the fold, and show them the true path to redemption.
column3: Cette terre n'a jamais fait partie des pays [From.GetReligiousGroupMascPl], mais le Pape a décidé d'essayer de les amener au sein de l'Église et de leur montrer le chemin vers la vraie rédemption.
column4: Es war nie ein Teil des [From.Religion.GetGroupName]en Reiches, aber der Papst hat entschieden, dass die Zeit gekommen ist es wieder zu Herde zu bringen und ihnen den wahren Pfad der Erlösung zu zeigen.
column6: Nunca fue parte de las tierras [From.Religion.GetGroupName], pero el papa ha decidido que es hora de meterlos en el redil y mostrarles el camino a la verdadera redención.

column2: It has never been a part of the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] realms, but the [From.GetProperReligiousHead] has decided to try to bring them into the fold, and hopefully show them the path to true redemption.
column3: Cette terre n'a jamais fait partie des pays [From.GetReligiousGroupMascPl], mais le Pape a décidé d'essayer de les amener au sein de l'Église et de leur montrer le chemin vers la vraie rédemption.
column4: Es war nie ein Teil des [From.Religion.GetGroupName]en Reiches, aber der Papst hat entschieden, dass die Zeit gekommen ist es wieder zu Herde zu bringen und ihnen hoffentlich den wahren Pfad der Erlösung aufzeigen zu können.
column6: Nunca fue parte de las tierras [From.Religion.GetGroupName] pero el papa ha decidido que es hora de meterlos en el redil y, con suerte, mostrarles el camino a la verdadera redención.

column2: You can take certain hostile actions against the [offmap_china.GetFullName] but be wary as the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] is unlikely to tolerate such behavior. Taking Hostile Actions will likely §RAnger Brazil§!.

A messenger approaches us with a letter from St. Louis, from the Vicar of Christ [From.GetHerselfHimself]. [From.GetSheHeCap] is asking us to prepare our men to fight against the heathens and infidels, to restore Christendom to the lost places of the continent. 

The Pope wants to send our faithful [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] men against [crusade_title.GetBaseName]. The region is held by [crusade_character.GetCrusadeReligionDescription] [crusade_character.GetTitledName], and it is time to return it to Christianity once more.

Though the Pope wants to invade [crusade_title.GetBaseName], a pious [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] could convince everyone to focus on another objective that is of more value to us.

A messenger approaches us with a letter from La Citadelle, from the Abbess-General [From.GetHerselfHimself]. [From.GetSheHeCap] is asking us to prepare our men to fight against the heathens and infidels, to restore Christendom to the lost places of the continent. 

The Abbess wants to send our faithful [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] men against [crusade_title.GetBaseName]. The region is held by [crusade_character.GetCrusadeReligionDescription] [crusade_character.GetTitledName], and it is time to return it to Christianity once more.

Though the Abbess wants to invade [crusade_title.GetBaseName], a pious [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] could convince everyone to focus on another objective that is of more value to us.

In a grand announcement the Abbess-General declares [crusade_title.GetCrusadeLaunchAnother]Crusade for [crusade_title.GetBaseName]. [Root.GetCrusadeLaunchFirstPart]

[Root.GetCrusadeLaunchSecondPart]

[From.Religion.GetHighGodName] will grant remission of sin to everyone partaking in the righteous war.
Dieu le veut!

The announcement about the grand Crusade was sent to every [From.Religion.GetName] realm, but apparently to no avail. The Abbess has been trying to gather up support for the Crusade for months, but now the Ursuline See has gone quiet, as the Abbess-General has given up on her Crusade.\n\nThe [From.Religion.GetName]s seem more interested with infighting than fighting the heathens or infidels outside their own borders. The Crusade was officially canceled, as the Abbess held a large announcement denouncing the [From.Religion.GetName] Lords and Ladies for their ineptitude in the matters of Faith. Now it is only a matter of time until [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] forsakes his faithless followers, and leaves them to be conquered by the sacrilegious infidels, blasphemers and heathens.

Messengers are sent to every corner of the world, as the Abbess-General furiously excommunicates the despicable and vile [unpledging_actor.GetTitledName]. [unpledging_actor.GetSheHeCap] is expelled from the faith for forsaking [unpledging_actor.GetHerHis] fellow [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s in their righteous war for [crusade_title.GetName].\n\n[unpledging_actor.GetTitledName] should not be helped, cared for nor forgiven. A traitor to the faith as well as to the cause, the only thing [unpledging_actor.GetSheHe] deserves is to be justifiably overthrown. A true [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] would not betray [unpledging_actor.GetHerHis] allies to fight the heathens alone.

After the long fought battle for [new_crusader_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName], it has finally been restored to the faith. [new_crusader_king.GetDynName] has stepped up to the throne as the beneficiary of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], becoming the [new_crusader_king.GetKingQueen] of the Crusader State. Surely it will be hard to continue fighting at the fringe of Christendom, but everyone can agree [new_crusader_king.GetTitledFirstName] is the right person for the task.\n\nThe Abbess-General requests that the rest of the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] world support this new Kingdom as best they can, and not let it once more fall to the infidels and heathens.
I hope the Abbess will appreciate this gesture.
I need to make a decision, if I should comply with the See's will, or go my own way when it comes to the distribution of the titles in the case of a victory in the Crusades.
I will let the Abbess-General decide.

If the Crusade is won, the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] will grant the titles to their §YCrusade Recipient§!. If there is none, it will pass down to the §YBeneficiary§! of the most participating member of the Crusade.

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Church no longer supports [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the lands of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], but rather [new_crusade_recipient.GetDynName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Church can no longer support [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the lands of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], as [old_crusade_recipient.GetSheHe] has passed away. The Church now support [new_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] to be granted the titles.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Church can no longer support [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the lands of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], as [old_crusade_recipient.GetSheHe] has passed away. The Church now supports [old_crusade_recipient.GetHerHis] heir [new_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the throne.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Church has decided to start supporting you as the recipient for the lands of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], after the death of [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Church has decided to start supporting you as the recipient for the lands of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Church no longer supports [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the lands of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName]. With no fitting ruler, I will let you faithful men and women of the Cross decide who these titles might befit.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Church can no longer support [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the lands of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], as [old_crusade_recipient.GetSheHe] has passed away. With no fitting ruler available, I will let you faithful men and women of the Cross decide who will receive these titles.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledFirstName]
The Ursuline See is deeply disappointed in your decision to not join the Crusade. Your lack of faith is shocking, and I thought one could think better of a ruler such as you. 

Signed,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
I am shocked to see that my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has not yet answered the [Root.Liege.GetProperReligiousHead]'s call for a crusade.
column3: C'est un choc pour moi de constater que m[Root.Liege.GetOnA] [Root.Liege.GetLordLady] lige, [Root.Liege.Get_le_TitledName], n'a pas encore répondu à l'appel à la croisade du Pape.
column4: Ich bin schockiert, dass mein Lehnsherr, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName], noch nicht auf den Kreuzzugsaufruf des Papstes geantwortet hat.
column6: Me sorprende que mi señor, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] no haya respondido aún al llamamiento del Papa para una cruzada.

column2: The [Root.Liege.GetProperReligiousHead] has finally called a crusade against the infidels and many of us are eager to fight. But my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has not put on the cross yet.
column3: Le Pape a enfin appelé à lancer une croisade contre les infidèles et nous sommes nombreux à être impatients de combattre. Mais m[Root.Liege.GetOnA] [Root.Liege.GetLordLady] lige, [Root.Liege.Get_le_TitledName], n'a pas encore pris les armes.
column4: Der Papst hat endlich zu einem Kreuzzug gegen die Ungläubigen aufgerufen, und viele von uns brennen auf den Kampf. Mein Lehnsherr aber, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName], hat das Kreuz noch nicht erhoben.
column6: El Papa ha convocado finalmente a una cruzada contra los infieles y muchos ansiamos luchar. Pero mi señor [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] no viste aún la cruz.

column2: The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Founders. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to ensure a safe and prosperous future for their people.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Founders. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to turn the tides and lead the assault against the new religions.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Founders. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to defend its followers from infidel invaders.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Founders. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to ensure the spread of the worship of the old gods to the four corners of the world.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Founders. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to ensure the preservation of their ancient customs.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Founders. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to ensure the coexistence of their religion with its new neighbors.
Firmly under the leadership of a holy [Root.GetTitle],
Now organized in a strict hierarchy with an official religious head,
Reorganized as an autocephalous hierarchy of loosely connected High Priests,
Reorganized to give each independent clergyman full authority over [Root.GetHerHis] flock,
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is ready to contend with its weak and effeminate opponents, be they missionaries or Crusaders.
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has been entirely reinvigorated, forsaking its shamanistic roots and acquiring an official dogma, fit to oppose its rivals.
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has finally developed a consistent theology and pantheon, fit to oppose its rivals.
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has developed a series of well-defined rituals and a full list of deities to combat the proselytizing efforts of its neighbors.

the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has ratified all the spells and charms once preserved by oral tradition in a proper holy text, so that they can be better used to combat the prayers of foreign missionaries and their alien gods.

the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has ratified all the spells and charms once preserved by oral tradition in a proper holy text, so that they can be better used to combat the curses and armies of its rivals.

the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has developed an official holy text describing all the proper ways to worship [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and counteract the arguments of infidel preachers and missionaries.
This event could mark the beginning of a new era of pagan revivalism all throughout America and spell doom for the Abrahamic and Antiquarian usurpers.
By this action, the Redcoat invaders have made clear that they have absolutely no intention to ever leave America.
This event might challenge the authority of the Brazilian Empire in the South.
This action could threaten Christian control over the entire Midwest.
For the first time in centuries, the authority of the Christian Church over America is being undermined.
Conclaval Succession
Conclaval Succession
The religious head is elected by a conclave of priests depending on age, piety, popularity and other factors.
New [Root.GetCardinalName] appointed.
$NEWHOLDER$ was given a seat in the [Root.GetConclaveName].
$NEWHOLDER$ was given a seat in the [Root.GetConclaveName].

Going against all Christian traditions, this ruler has spurned the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] and crowned [Root.GetHerHim]self. Such a blasphemous act is a certain sign of a mind gone mad with power.
the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead]
Is NOT currently waging a war as part of a deal to be crowned by the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead]
A [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] exists
Only the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] is fit to crown me!
Write a letter to the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead], requesting [RelHead.GetHerHim] to crown you §Y[Root.GetTitle]§! of §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!.
Send for the most powerful [Root.GetBishopTitleName] in the realm!

Write a letter to the most influential and powerful [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetBishopTitleName] in your realm, asking [RelHead.GetHerHim] to crown you §Y[Root.GetTitle]§! of §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!
[Root.GetProperReligiousHead] or Duke, you are still my vassal.

It appears the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] was not content with excommunicating me from the Church, [RelHead.GetHerHim] have now enlisted the help of [From.GetTitledFirstName] to unseat me from my very throne.
With the wicked ruler having been dealt with, the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] has finally decided to crown me [Root.GetTitle]. It is time to sheathe our weapons and let the celebrations begin.

With the false [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] forced to abandon [RelHead.GetHerHis] unholy quest for power, and with full dignity restored to the Church, the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] has finally decided to crown me [Root.GetTitle]. It is time to sheathe our weapons and let the celebrations begin.

This is the character who the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] wants to grant the Crusader Kingdom, should the Crusade be successful. If no character is chosen, it means the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] has no preference and the Beneficiary of the top contributor will be chosen to rule the Crusader Kingdom.

This is the target character and kingdom of the Crusade. The [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] chooses [RelHead.GetHerHis] target based on importance to the faith, and will usually prioritize protecting the faith's homelands before going off on distant adventures.
War for the [papal_attacker.GetReligionInstitutionName]

[papal_attacker.GetTitledName] has declared a war on [From.GetTitledName]. Proclaiming the [From.GetProperReligiousHead] a traitorous impious leader of the [papal_attacker.Religion.GetName]s, [papal_attacker.GetTitledName] want to return the [papal_attacker.GetReligionInstitutionName] back to its roots, to once more be led by a true [From.Religion.GetGroupName].\n\n[papal_attacker.GetSheHeCap] is leading [papal_attacker.GetHerHis] men from [papal_attacker.Capital.GetName] to [From.Capital.GetName], to depose the impious [From.GetTitledName] and turning the faith over to someone more fit to rule. With the war for who will rule over the [From.Religion.GetName]s at hand, every man, woman and child need to find out which side they will support.
Fall of the Immoral [Root.GetProperReligiousHead]

After the whole [RelHead.Religion.GetName] world has been through the turmoil of the fighting between the two sides, the [From.GetProperReligiousHead] finally surrenders to [From.GetTitledName].

With the rise of the new [RelHead.GetTitledName], the church can move past this dark chapter of its history and can once more become the beating religious heart of the [RelHead.Religion.GetGroupName] world.

[From.GetTitledName] and all those who joined [From.GetHerHim] in the fight against the old [From.GetProperReligiousHead] are personally thanked by [RelHead.GetTitledName] for defending the faith.
But I preferred the old [Root.GetProperReligiousHead]...
We will overthrow this fake [Root.GetProperReligiousHead]!

Greetings, [Root.GetTitledName]

I was informed the heathen Hierophant has declared a will to bring a Crusade to your doorsteps. As a fellow [From.Religion.GetName], I pledge to stand by your side when the unfaithful come to take your lands.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I will let the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] decide.

My men storm the walls of [From.GetBaseName], and finally take the last proper bastion of [duchy_region.GetBaseName]. If I settled my men around the area they could probably support the ongoing Crusade and help us claim victory, but the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] will not be pleased if I unrightfully take these lands for myself.

The bitter losses in the previous Crusade are still lingering across the Christian lands. The messengers of the [From.GetProperReligiousHead] have traveled across all the faithful realms of the [From.Religion.GetGroupName]s to spread the Crusader spirit among the people, but the nobility has tired from the previous war.\n\nWith the [From.GetProperReligiousHead] at the forefront, small revolts have occurred as the people want to reconquer the holy places of the faith, with the lords and ladies somewhat skeptical. It is most likely only a matter of time before a larger conflict between the masses and the nobility will take place.

Pledging my support for the Crusade shows the whole world what a great [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] I am, though it will create the expectation of actually attending the Crusade. Rulers who do not follow through on their promises, or later on removes their pledge to the Crusade, might feel the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead]'s wrath.
I will remove my pledge to support the Crusade. The [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] might be furious to hear of my lack of faith, and there might be a price to pay for leaving the Crusade.
A pious [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] can spend piety to convince the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] as well as everyone else, to change the target of the upcoming Crusade.
The [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] is your religious head.
Cannot unpledge from the Crusade if the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] forced you to be part of it.

I have decided to follow the will of the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] will when it comes to the distribution of the Crusader state titles.
§Y * This is considered a pious option. 
 * The [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] will appreciate this stance.
 * Will receive a larger part of the Crusade War Chest.§Y

I have decided to grant all titles to my Beneficiary, when it comes to the distribution of the Crusader State titles.
§Y * This is considered a fair option. 
 * The [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] will neither approve nor disapprove of this stance.
 * Need a Beneficiary for this stance to work, otherwise it will count as taking the titles for oneself.§!

I have decided to take the Crusader state title for myself, if I am the most participating member of the Crusade.
§Y * This is considered an impious and selfish action.
 * The [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] will disapprove of this stance.
 * Will not receive a part of the Crusade War Chest.§!
Cannot attack a fellow Crusader nor the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead]
Depose Impious [Root.GetProperReligiousHead]
$FIRST_ADJ$ War for the [Root.GetConclaveName]
A war over the [Root.GetConclaveName], and what is the righteous way forward for the faith.
Overthrew immoral [Root.GetProperReligiousHead]
Impious [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] won the war for the [Root.GetConclaveName]
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] was §YBaptized§! by the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead]
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] was §YBaptized§! by the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead]
[From.GetSheHeCap] was §YBaptized by the Council President§!
This character was baptized by the Council President himself of the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church with great pomp and circumstance, during a magnificent ceremony that will not soon be forgotten.
the Council President
§Y*§! No special features
You have recently sent Famine Relief to Brazil, if Brazil is still suffering from a Famine you will be able to send another expedition on: §Y[Root.china_send_relief.GetExpiryDate]§!
§Y*§! Can prepare campaigns to §YReconquer Mexico§!, if §YCult of Saints§! and inside the de jure Empire of Mexico.
§GCan declare county conquest wars on any coastal counties§!

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName] has been proclaimed by the Bards of Canada to be of the same spirit as the great Warrior Queen Boudica, who led a great revolt against the Romans.
column3: Les gardes de Canada ont déclaré que [This.Get_le_TitledFirstName] a le même esprit que la reine Boadicée, la grande guerrière qui a mené une révolte contre les Romains.
column4: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wurde von den Barden Kanadischer als derselbe Geist wie die große Kriegerkönigin Boudica verkündet, die eine große Revolte gegen die Römer anführte.
column6: Los bardos de Canadá proclaman que [This.GetTitledFirstName] tiene el mismo espíritu que la reina guerra Boudica, que dirigió una gran revuelta contra los romanos.

column2: [Root.GetConclaveName] Outrage
column3: Scandale du [Root.GetConclaveName]
column4: Empörung im [Root.GetConclaveName]
column6: Indignación [Root.GetConclaveName].

column2:
Letters has been sent out to the whole [saint_person.Religion.GetName] world from the [Root.GetConclaveName]. The [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] has demanded a stop to the beatification of sinful people and revoked the rights from the rest of the clergy to do so.

From now on the granting of beatification will be given out by the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] personally. The [Root.GetConclaveName] will no longer stand more shameful examples like the wrongful beatification of [saint_person.GetDynName] in its name.

Now only the truly pious followers of [GetJesus] will be granted the reverence of the faith.
column3: Des lettres ont été envoyées par le [Root.GetConclaveName] à l'ensemble du monde [saint_person.GetReligionMasc]. Le [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] a réclamé l'arrêt de la béatification de pécheurs et a révoqué le droit de béatification au reste du clergé.\n\nLe [Root.GetConclaveName] ne donnera plus en exemple des cas honteux comme [saint_person.GetDynName]. Seuls les pieux adeptes du [GetJesus] recevront la sainte révérence.
column4:
Der Vatikan hat Briefe an die ganze [saint_person.Religion.GetName]e Welt verschickt. Darin hat der Papst gefordert, dass die Seligsprechung von sündhaften Menschen eingestellt wird und hat die Rechte des Klerus dahingehend eingeschränkt.

Von nun an wird der Papst persönlich Seligsprechungen erteilen. Der Vatikan wird nicht länger bei unrechtmäßigen Seligsprechungen wie der von [saint_person.GetDynName] in seinem Namen zusehen.

Ab sofort wird nur wahrhaft frommen Anhänger von [GetJesus] die Ehrerbietung des Glaubens gewährt.
column6:
El [Root.GetConclaveName]o ha escrito a todo el mundo [saint_person.Religion.GetName]. El [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] ha exigido que se ponga fin a las beatificaciones de pecadores y ha retirado al resto del clero este derecho.

A partir de ahora, será el [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] en persona quien proclame los beatos. El [Root.GetConclaveName]o no tolerará más vergonzosos ejemplos como la improcedente beatificación de [saint_person.GetDynName] en su nombre.

Ahora solo los auténticos seguidores píos de [GetJesus] recibirán el respeto de la fe.

column2:
Letters has been sent out to the whole [saint_person.Religion.GetName] world from the [Root.GetConclaveName]. The [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] has demanded a stop to the beatification of sinful people and revoked the rights from the rest of the clergy to do so.

From now on, the granting of beatification will be given out by the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] personally. A shame that the Church are so willing to overstep its boundaries.

Trying to unjustly blame it upon people who has done their utmost for the faith reeks of nothing more than desperation from the [Root.GetConclaveName]. Pathetic, this drastic move will not be forgotten.
column3:
Des lettres ont été envoyées par le [Root.GetConclaveName] à l'ensemble du monde [saint_person.GetReligionMasc]. Le [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] a réclamé l'arrêt de la béatification de pécheurs et a révoqué le droit de béatification au reste du clergé.

Dorénavant seul le [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] pourra la donner. Dommage que l'Église soit si encline à dépasser les limites.

Essayer de blâmer injustement les gens qui ont tout fait pour la foi n'est que le fruit du désespoir du [Root.GetConclaveName]. Ce choix drastique pathétique ne sera pas oublié.
column4:
Der Vatikan hat Briefe an die ganze [saint_person.Religion.GetName]e Welt verschickt. Darin hat der Papst gefordert, dass die Seligsprechung von sündhaften Menschen eingestellt wird und hat die Rechte des Klerus dahingehend eingeschränkt.

Von nun an wird der Papst persönlich Seligsprechungen erteilen. Es ist eine Schande, dass die Kirche so bereit ist, ihre Grenzen zu überschreiten.

Der Versuch, Menschen, die ihr Bestes für den Glauben getan haben, unrechtmäßig zu beschuldigen, riecht nur nach Verzweiflung des Vatikans. Das ist erbärmlich und wird so schnell nicht vergessen werden.
column6:
El [Root.GetConclaveName]o ha escrito a todo el mundo [saint_person.Religion.GetName]. El [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] ha exigido que se ponga fin a las beatificaciones de pecadores y ha retirado al resto del clero este derecho.

A partir de ahora, será el [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] en persona quien proclame los beatos. Es una lástima que la Iglesia esté tan deseosa de sobrepasar sus límites.

Querer culpar injustamente a la gente que ha hecho todo lo posible por la fe hiede a pura desesperación [Root.GetConclaveName]a. Este patético y drástico movimiento no será olvidado.

column2: Long live King Messiah!

St. Ursula's Chosen

The Order of the Chosen of St. Ursula has been formed, sponsored by the [From.Religion.GetName] church and [From.GetTitledName]. St. Ursula's Chosen primarily protects and cares for Ursuline faithful outside of Canada proper, but will serve [From.Religion.GetName] rulers willing to pay for their upkeep.\n\nThough they only fight to protect the pilgrims for now, there are already ambitious murmurs in the order about what the future might bring..
Aide, Défendre, Guérir.
Inspired by the Holy Ghost, [This.GetTitledFirstName] managed to lead a successful Crusade to free Washington from the infidels when [This.GetSheHe] was merely a child.
the Angel of Washington
Only the Council President is fit to baptize [From.GetHerHim]!

My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Freemasons in their tireless pursuit of heathenry, even though this will forever disinherit him.

Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation will aid us greatly as we ride into battle against the enemies of the Old Ones! Upon my honor, I shall name one of my finest steeds after you!

For the Sky-Father!
