column2: Fall of the Ursuline State

After finally losing their final bastion, St. Ursula's Chosen are once more landless and have started traveling back to the core lands of Christendom.

As they no longer have a realm of their own, they are once more known as St. Ursula's Chosen, and will offer their services to whatever Christian Lord or Lady fighting the infidels.

The fall of the Ursuline State is surely a blow to the Ursulines.
Those of the Chosen are not meant to rule.
Lacustrine Campaign

[From.GetTitledName] has started planning a campaign against the pagans of the Great Lakes. For too long, the pagans have been steadfast in their fights against the [From.Religion.GetGroupName]s, and [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to convert them with the sword.

The wild people of the lakes have started gathering in response, bellowing their battle hymns and demonic rituals, unstoppable in their frenzy. Surely, this will lead to a bloodbath on both sides, as neither will let the other be.

With a final blessing from [From.RelHead.GetTitledName], the armies of the Ursulines leave Canada for good.
Maybe I could ask §Y[d_st_ursulas_chosen.GetName]§! for help with my pagan neighbors?
The Ursulines in [holy_order_potential_title.GetName]

Supported by the charitable [From.GetTitledName], St. Ursula's Chosen has settled down in [holy_order_potential_title.GetBaseName]. Dedicated to removing the lacustrine infidels once and for all, [d_st_ursulas_chosen.Holder.GetTitledName] has started a massive campaign in order to revitalize [holy_order_potential_title.GetName] and turn it into a staging ground for their future wars.\n\nWorking out of [FromFrom.Capital.GetName], it is only a matter of time before they will conquer the rest of [kingdom_title.GetBaseName]. The heathens look towards the new seat of St. Ursula's Chosen with fear and skepticism, knowing they will have to fight to retain their ungodly ways and traditions.

[Root.GetTitledName]
We wish to finally root out our ancient enemies in the Great Lakes, and your newfound lands of [holy_order_potential_title.GetBaseName] would help us greatly in this mission. We would re-compensate you for your troubles, as we would not dare insult one with your status.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I would be happy to help [d_st_ursulas_chosen.GetName]!
§Y[holy_order_potential_title.GetBaseName]§! is given to §Y[d_st_ursulas_chosen.Holder.GetTitledName]§!

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write you this letter to inform you that me and my troops have officially left your service. We no longer see you fit to rule, and we have once more returned to the faithful service of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Ask St. Ursula's Chosen for Help
You can ask §YSt. Ursula's Chosen§! to target a local pagan ruler in their lacustrine campaigns.
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] protects me!
column3: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] me protège !
column4: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] beschützt mich!
column6: ¡[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] me protege!

column2: As I struggled in my bed, burned by the fever, I felt as if somebody was dragging me below the ground itself, to be crushed and suffocate under dirt and ashes. The grotesque spawns of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] then crawled beside me, crying and gnawing at my limbs.
column3: Luttant dans mon lit, brûlante de fièvre, j'eus l'impression que quelqu'un m'entraînait sous le sol, pour m'écraser et me faire suffoquer sous la poussière et la cendre. La monstrueuse progéniture de [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] rampa alors à côté de moi, pleurant et rongeant mes membres.
column4: Während ich im Bett gegen das Fieber kämpfte, fühlte ich mich, als würde mich jemand unter den Boden ziehen und unter Erde und Asche zerquetschen und ersticken. Anschließend krochen und weinten die grotesken Erzeugungen von [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] neben mir und weinten und nagten an meinen Gliedmaßen.
column6: Según me retorcía en la cama, ardiendo de fiebre, sentí como si algo me arrastrase al suelo para ser aplastada y ahogada bajo tierra y cenizas. La grotesca prole de [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] se arrastró junto a mí, llorando y mordisqueándome los miembros.

column2: Blood of Thunder
Raven's Blood

Tonight, the mead hall has been inflamed by rumors of a great eagle terrorizing [Root.Capital.GetName]'s countryside. The man who spotted the beast claims that it is the companion of a legendary hunter of the plains, driven mad after tasting the flesh of his own master. The older members of the Lodge agree that, as the [Root.GetLordLady] of [Root.Capital.GetName], it is my duty to track down and slay this beast.
column3: Ce soir, la halle de l'hydromel a été agitée par une rumeur selon laquelle un grand aigle terroriserait la campagne de [Root.Capital.GetName]. L'homme qui a repéré la bête affirme que c'est le compagnon d'un chasseur légendaire de la steppe, rendu fou après avoir goûté la chair de son propre maître. Les membres les plus âgés de la Loge s'accordent sur le fait qu'en tant que [Root.GetLordLady] de ces terres, il est de mon devoir de traquer et de tuer cet animal.
column4: Die Halle ist mit Gerüchten über einen großen Adler gefüllt, der das Land rund um [Root.Capital.GetName] terrorisieren soll. Es soll der Gefährte eines legendären Steppenjägers sein, der verrückt wurde, nachdem er das Fleisch seines eigenen Meisters gekostet hat. Die Loge stimmt zu, dass es als [Root.GetLordLady] von [Root.Capital.GetName] meine Pflicht ist, dieses Biest aufzuspüren und zu töten.
column6: Esta noche, la gran sala arde con el rumor de que una gran águila aterroriza el campo de [Root.Capital.GetName]. El hombre que vio a la bestia afirma que es el compañero de un cazador legendario de la estepa, enloquecido tras probar la carne de su propio amo. Los miembros más veteranos de la logia coinciden en que mi deber como [Root.GetLordLady] de [Root.Capital.GetName] es dar caza y matar a la bestia.

column2: Word has reached you that there is another Immortal, Connor, who is seeking you out. This "Scotsman" has heard of your Immortality and has vowed to put it to an end. While his motivations are unknown, his intentions appear clear and it is only a matter of time until he finds you.

Word of a monstrous man has reached you. This sadistic creature, known as Dracula, is also Immortal, but can only remain alive by drinking the blood of others. Rumors say that he is seeking a cure for his bloodthirst, and he believes that drinking your blood will free him from his curse forever. If these rumors are to be believed, he is certain track you down and attempt to kill you sooner rather than later...

As you step out your rooms you barely have time to wonder where your guards are before you are confronted by [immortal_rival.GetFirstName].\n 'I vant to suck your blood!' he hisses, hefting his sword.
A [child_of_destiny.GetManWoman] of true legend. [child_of_destiny.GetHerHisCap] exploits mimicked those of George Washington himself!

A great conqueror by the name of [child_of_destiny.GetFirstNameWithNick] has invaded and taken over the realm of [child_of_destiny.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] is a [child_of_destiny.GetManWoman] of unrivaled ambition, with eyes set on the rest of the Western Hemisphere. Time will tell if [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] will build an empire to rival that of the ancient Americans, or if [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] will march [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] army into oblivion...

At last the Great Schism between the Catholic Church and Evangelical Protestantism has been mended. With the Catholic takeover of the nation's ancient capital, the Catholic Church has now declared all forms of Evangelical Protestantism to be illegitimate and heretical, mostly ending the millenia-old schism between Catholics and Protestants.
I will travel to see the shrine to the Canadian Martyrs.
San Felipe de Jesús is well known for his importance to the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] faith.
To Maryland and the grave of St. Elizabeth Ann Seton!

The journey to Midland has been planned for a while. The north is a cold and brutal place, so I have prepared for any potential risks I might meet in Canada. I am excited to finally be on my way, to find my destiny as I search for the shrine to the Canadian Martyrs.

The journey to Maryland has been planned for a while. Despite the mild climate of the Mid-Atlantic, a traveler has to be properly prepared for long trips like these. I am excited to finally be on my way, to find my destiny as I search for the final burial place of Saint Elizabeth Ann Seton.

The journey to the ancient city of Mexico has been planned for a while. A traveler has to be prepared for what you might meet in the exotic lands of Central America. I am excited to finally be on my way, to find my destiny as I search for the final burial place of San Felipe.
I come across another group of pilgrims, also traveling to Ontario, to ask for the blessing of the Martyrs. Traveling together could be beneficial, and safer, though probably somewhat slower.
I come across another group of pilgrims, also traveling to ask for the blessing of San Felipe. Traveling together could be beneficial, and safer, though probably somewhat slower.
I come across another group of pilgrims, also traveling to Maryland, to ask for the blessing of Saint Elizabeth. Traveling together could be beneficial, and safer, though probably somewhat slower.

It is getting progressively colder, as I am getting closer to my destination. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to Midland by now. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.
I wonder what awaits me in Midland.
The days have been long, but nice and temperate. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to Maryland. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.
I wonder what awaits me in Maryland.

There have been new sights to behold every day, as I travel to Mexico. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to Mexico City. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.
I wonder what awaits me in Mexico.

All of a sudden, I find myself in Midland before I know it. It has been a long journey through the wilds, to once more see people is a nice change. As I walk through the city streets, I compare it to my homeland, how the people have dealt with the cold and ice in these lands. I should find my way to the shrine of the Martyrs as quickly as possible, that is what I am here for after all.

The whole area is empty besides a nun cleaning a corner of the small chapel. She approaches me, and asks if I am here to see the shrine to the Martyrs. I give here a small nod, before she brings me before the altar of the chapel. She kneels down next to me, and we take a moment to pray to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] together. And then I am left alone with the shrine.

All of a sudden, I find myself in Maryland before I know it. It has been a long journey through the wilds, to once more see people is a nice change. As I walk through the city streets, I compare it to my homeland, and consider all the differences between the two. I should find my way to the burial site of Saint Elizabeth as quickly as possible, that is what I am here for after all.

The burial site of Saint Elizabeth is a large one in the middle of a square, and few of the local populace seem to care much. I can see a couple of other pilgrims like myself, standing around the grave, looking somewhat flustered, yet happy. I can relate to them, as my journey finally reached its conclusion here in Maryland. I take a long time to pray before the grave site.

All of a sudden, I find myself in Mexico City before I know it. It has been a long journey through the wilds and to once more see people is nice. As I walk through the city streets, I compare it to my homeland, and wonder how people have adjusted to these exotic lands. I should find my way to the burial site of San Felipe as quickly as possible, that is what I am here for after all.

It takes me a good while until I finally manage to find the chapel I was looking for. As I enter, I can truly feel the presence of San Felipe lingering in the place. I spend several minutes praying, until finally a priest appears. I am taken back, when he explains to me that San Felipe was in fact moved away from the chapel several centuries ago. That explains the lack of other pilgrims.
Star Player
This character is a famous and skilled warrior, attracting the mightiest of teammates to [GetHerHis] side.

The runestone you commissioned has been finished and raised on the spot you chose for it. You examine the runes:

[Root.GetFirstName], proud [Root.GetSonDaughter] of a holy union between Thor and a female incarnation of his adopted sibling Loki, paid Olaf handsomely to carve these runes. With [Root.GetHerHis] flying metal longship and its ragtag crew of Guardians, including a talking raccoon and an intelligent tree, [Root.GetFirstName] earned [Root.GetHerHis] fame by saving the galaxy from evil.

You leave the stone, content in the knowledge that many centuries from now, when its paint has long since faded, scholars will be studying these rune carvings in an effort to glean the wisdom of their words.

The runestone you commissioned has been finished and raised on the spot you chose for it. You examine the runes:

[Root.GetFirstName], the servant of Thanos, had these runes carved to celebrate the immense power of [Root.GetHerHis] master. Hear me and rejoice, pitiful mortals. A thousand years from now, you will have the privilege of being saved by the Great Titan. You may think it is suffering, but it will be salvation. Balance will be restored, and the sun will rise on a grateful universe.

You leave the stone, content in the knowledge that many centuries from now, when its paint has long since faded, scholars will be studying these rune carvings in an effort to glean the wisdom of their words.

Bards sing of a Shieldmaiden named Brunnhilde, or perhaps she is a Valkyrie walking the earth. Regardless, it is said she is another Immortal and that she thrives on battle. In the most popular ballad she teams up with an enchantress named Amora before being betrayed and trapped in a mystical prison. Her powers and mind are used for Amora's own ends, although eventually the true Valkyrie regains her strength and escapes. If these tales are true, she may well seek you out and challenge you to a duel.
gains the trait '§YBaptized by the Council President§!'

It is rumored that a great warrior from a distant land is currently passing through [Root.Location.GetName]. He is said to have taken part in a hundred battles or more, and his legendary fighting skills are supposedly without peer. Perhaps he could be persuaded to pass on some of his knowledge to you...

The old warrior from far away has settled down in your castle, and your training is proceeding well. One day as you walk into his room, you see the man trying to catch a fly with the pair of small wooden sticks he insists on using whenever he eats. You inquire why, and he explains: "Man who catch fly with chopstick accomplish anything."

In an effort to convince the court of my commitment to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I have gone to the local Factory, to make an offering at the house of the Machine Spirits. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me warily as I walk up the steps and enter the building. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.

I perform the sacred rituals around each of the machines in the factory, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods at me, and I bow before the assembly line. When I finally turn to address the gathering crowd, I imagine that it is[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] I am praising – unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.

I perform the sacred rituals around each of the machines in the factory, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] shoots me a suspicious glance, and I inhale deeply, while studying the intricate gears and pulleys. Isn't [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] a vengeful god? The factory suddenly feels far too crowded. In a moment of weakness, I hastily exit the sanctuary, leaving the worshipers confused.

As I step up to the altar I make a quick decision – I collapse dramatically before the assembly line, to the gasps of onlooking worshipers. Then I begin quoting [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], and I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the Machine Spirits themselves. When my last words ring out, everyone seems to be holding their breath. For a moment I worry that my stunt has failed. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] exclaims "A VISION! My [Root.GetLordLady], let me help you stand!"

I step forwards and make a bold decision – as I reach one of the machines I collapse to the floor. The worshipers gasp as I, their [Root.GetTitle], begin quoting fragments of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the Machine Spirits themselves. When my last words ring out, they start to whisper. For a moment I am convinced that my stunt has succeeded. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] prods at me. "Uhm, my [Root.GetLordLady]? Let's get you back onto your feet."

My poem went all wrong, the feeling I wanted to express lost among the words and the result was just a piece of spoiled parchment. This failure made me question my passion for writing poetry, even more so as the new poet at court had demonstrated his superior memory and mastery only yesterday.
column3: J'ai raté mon poème, ne parvenant pas à trouver les mots justes pour exprimer ce que je ressentais. Résultat : du parchemin gâché ! Cet échec m'a conduit[Root.Get_E] à m'interroger sur ma passion pour l'écriture de la poésie, d'autant que la veille, le nouveau poète de la Cour avait démontré combien il maîtrise cet art.
column4: Mein Gedicht war eine Katastrophe. Das Gefühl, das ich vermitteln wollte, ging in den Worten verloren, und das Ergebnis war nichts als ein Stück besudeltes Pergament. Dies ließ mich meine Leidenschaft fürs Dichten in Frage stellen, da der neue Hofdichter sein überragendes Gedächtnis und seine Wortgewalt erst gestern unter Beweis gestellt hatte.
column6: Mi poema salió mal, no logré expresar el sentimiento que deseaba y el resultado fue tan solo un trozo de pergamino desperdiciado. El error me hizo replantearme mi pasión por la poesía escrita, sobre todo sabiendo que ayer mismo el nuevo poeta de la corte demostró poseer mejor memoria y maestría.

column2: I will write a song to show her the depth of my love!
I should have practiced more...
My beautiful melody thawed her heart!
I spent several days practicing until my voice was hoarse and my fingers bled, but when I performed the song for her, she finally smiled at me! It seems my efforts have paid off.
I knew I could do it!
A new bird has arrived in the mews, a new book on the art of writing poetry is in the library, and an instrument has recently become available to rent.
I should rent the instrument.
An Instrument Of Failure...
An Instrument Of Success!
This instrument is simply awful. It's always out of tune, and it seems to be falling apart at the seams. I can't play a decent tune on this to save my life.
Maybe I just don't have talent...
This instrument is amazing! It feels like an extension of my very body.
Give me another note parchment!
I have mastered this instrument. I play it every single day, and my courtiers have begun gathering outside my room to hear me play.
I'm a musician!
I'm sure they're just being polite...

After finishing a hearty breakfast you belch contentedly and remark upon your foresightedness in ensuring [Root.Capital.GetName]'s larders were well stocked. However, as soon as the words leave your lips you notice the suddenly panicked look on your servant's face. "My [Root.GetTitle], you just ate the very last stuffed turkey, and almost all our other food stocks are nearing exhaustion. Furthermore-". Your servant continues to drone on, but you are too aghast to listen. No more turkeys?!
Form the Empire of Zion

I will not stop until the dream of creating a true Kingdom of Heaven on Earth has been fulfilled. I will make sure that the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith will never perish from this world or the next.
Holds the §YCounty§! of §YSalt Lake§!
Completely controls the region of §YGreater Deseret§!
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! creates the §YEmpire of Zion§!
The Rise Of Zion

Ever since the Great Judgement, faithful Mormons have prayed for the creation of a true Kingdom of Heaven on Earth, one immune from gentile incursions and spanning the entire area of Greater Deseret. [From.GetTitledName] has finally allowed these prayers to be answered.\n\nIn a grand announcement in front of [From.GetHerHis] castle in [From.Capital.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] declared that the "Empire of Zion" had arisen on Earth, and that [From.GetSheHe] had been chosen by [mormon.GetHighGodName] to be its ruler. [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s faithful subjects have readily accepted [From.GetHerHis] claim, and the Latter-Day Saints faith is now at its strongest point in all of history.
Praise [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!
A black day!
I'd better get with the program...
Shomrim
column3: Shomrim
column4: Shomrim
column6: Shomrim

column2: Shomrim is a Hebrew word meaning "watcher" or "guardian". They fight for the Jewish faith.
[northern_crusade_kingdom.GetBaseName] Pacified
column3: [northern_crusade_kingdom.GetBaseName] en paix
column4: [northern_crusade_kingdom.GetBaseName] befriedet
column6: [northern_crusade_kingdom.GetBaseName] pacificado

column2:
Though it has been a long and grueling fight between the Ursulines and the natives of the [northern_crusade_kingdom.GetAdjective] lands, the campaign has finally ended with victory for the Christians.

No longer will the faithful in the Great Lakes fear for their lives, as St. Ursula's Chosen patrols the lands and make sure to punish any infidels who dare step into Christian lands. What was once known as the pagan fury of the lakes has been pacified, never to be seen again.

The rampage and danger has ended.
Aide, Défendre, Guérir!
Les Mille Clocher
column3: Les Mille Clocher
column4: Mille Clocher
column6: Los Miles de Campanarios

column2: The thousand steeples of Montreal gleaming in the sun remind attackers of the might arrayed against them.
column3: Les mille clochers de Montréal reluisant au soleil rappellent aux assaillants la force et foi qui les attends.
column4: The thousand steeples of Montreal gleaming in the sun remind attackers of the might arrayed against them.
column6: Los miles de campanarios de Montreal brillan en el sol y le acuerdan a los intrusos que hay agresores que los esperan.

column1: #in future make sure your pull requests don't remove existing localization

column2: The Blood of MacArthur

Legends about General MacArthur and his epic campaign across the Pacific are told throughout the known world. It is said that he was sent on his conquest by the great Roosevelt himself against the Empire of Nippon for their incursions on holy American soil. MacArthur took not only Nippon, but the whole of the East Indies as well.\nHowever, Roosevelt's successor was jealous of MacArthur's success and ordered him to return to America. Astonishingly. MacArthur agreed, which tragically doomed the Pacific to rule by Communism.\nRulers of creeds and nations across Old America claim to trace their ancestors to the fleeting line of MacArthur, yet none have been able to have such a prestigious claim be recognized by their peers and subjects.
Attempt to forge a claim to §YMacArthur's Bloodline§!.
The Tomb of MacArthur

The location of the hallowed grounds where the great conqueror was put to his final rest has been a contested topic ever since the great deluge. Many Emperors and Presidents of old have claimed to have visited the tomb of MacArthur during their rise to power, yet its true location still eludes modern scholars.\nThe recovery of my ancestor's sacred remains would surely strengthen my claim to his bloodline. As [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], I am closer than most contenders to the most likely locations, yet wasting time and resources in a quest that many have already failed to accomplish in the past might not be the wisest course of action.

The location of the hallowed grounds where the great conqueror was put to his final rest has been a contested topic ever since the great deluge. Many Emperors and Presidents of old have claimed to have visited the tomb of MacArthur during their rise to power, yet its true location still eludes modern scholars.\nThe recovery of my ancestor's sacred remains would surely strengthen my claim to his bloodline. Yet wasting time and resources in a quest that many have already failed to accomplish in the past might not be the wisest course of action, especially given how far my expedition would have to travel to reach the most likely locations of the tomb.
Finding MacArthur's remains is imperative!
Use your §YIntrigue§! and invest §YWealth§! to attempt to find §YMacArthur's Tomb§!
Use your §YLearning§! and invest §YWealth§! to attempt to establish a claim on §YMacArthur's Family§!
Abandon your quest to claim §YMacArthur's Bloodline§!.

Ever since the Event, the legend of MacArthur has inspired many to claim that they had possession of his body. They knew that becoming the guardian of his remains would be acclaimed as his true successor.\nAnd in the same way, I am certain that by ensuring the recovery of MacArthur's body my claim to his ancestry will be stronger than any upstart [Root.Culture.GetName] ruler. Having already spent several weeks consulting the most learned scholars in the realm to gather more information regarding the tomb's possible locations, it is now time for me to invest in a proper expedition to uncover the ancient sepulcher.

Historians agree that MacArthur had a son who had already become a man before his father's return to America, yet the life of this child is shrouded by mystery. Rather than following in his father's footsteps and becoming a great general, his son disappears from the historical record shortly after his arrival home.
Having spent his entire boyhood on campaign, it is understandable that he would want to live peacefully from then on.
It is not so far-fetched to think that his descendants made their way to [Root.Capital.GetName] eventually, and split into the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].
My scholars only need to find the right references in the ancient accounts of my dynasty to uncover this prestigious link.

The valiant members of my expedition have finally returned to [Root.Capital.GetName].
They bring a marvelous gift with them: a mummified corpse, clothed in an austere uniform that they claim to belong to my distinguished ancestor.
After a long consultation with my scholars, who carefully examine every detail of the body, I am certain that the expedition has been successful.
After having been lost for so many centuries, the body of General MacArthur has finally been found, and I am the one responsible for its recovery. The only thing that remains for my claim to MacArthur's ancestry to become unobjectionable is to make this news known throughout the world.

Despite all the sleepless nights, hundreds of researched scrolls and learned scholars, my efforts to find a link between my dynasty and MacArthur's unknown descendants has been fruitless.
Surely, a man that has traveled so far and wide, that has achieved so much during his brief life and earned eternal glory would not allow his glorious line to die out.
And a dynasty as powerful as mine, who has risen to hold the most esteemed throne of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] must surely trace its ancestry to the great conqueror himself.
Why is it then so hard for me to find the link between us?
Maybe I should focus my attention on MacArthur's tomb.
The Heir of MacArthur

After years of study, research and investment, I have finally achieved my goal and eternally bound my dynasty's name to one of the greatest conquerors of known history.\nLong after I am gone, people will look at my descendants in awe and tremble at the very thought of meeting them on the field of battle.\nWithin our veins flows the same strength that subjugated the East Indies, the same genius that cracked Nippon, the same ambition that led one man to bring down an entire empire.

Despite my best efforts, my peers have yet to recognize the legitimacy of my claim to MacArthur's ancestry.\nEven worse, my own subjects have reacted with apathy and skepticism to the news about my dynasty's prestigious founder. My councilors believe that the people are simply too ignorant to understand the importance of my discovery, while my peers are merely envious of its implications.\nFor one reason or the other, my quest is not over yet. My claim will have no value for as long as it is not universally recognized.
The Heir of MacArthur

There have been many rumors about [From.GetTitledFirstName] recently.\nUsing the help of charlatans, sorcerers and grave-robbers, the [From.GetTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has fabricated a ludicrous claim to General MacArthur's dynasty. Many rulers have made such ludicrous assertions in the past, trying to latch onto the glorious name of the ancient conqueror, yet none had been taken seriously, until now.\nBy associating [From.GetHerHis] family with MacArthur, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has succeeded in increasing enormously the prestige of the [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] for centuries to come.
Despite your best efforts, you have not found enough skilled warriors to join you in your quest.
We will have to start again from scratch...
I am sure we can find warriors this time...
We will have to try again later...
Perhaps it would be best to abandon this effort altogether...
No active Reconquests in Mexico
Let the coffee flow.

News reaches you of a traveling Muslim scholar who just arrived on a ship in the harbor of [arab_scholar_trade_post_target.GetName]. The scholar, named [recruited_physician_target.GetFullName], is rumored to be working on a compendium of medical treatments - this likely makes [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] a willing candidate for the position of physician, as [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] would be able to continue [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis] work at your court!
Join Reconquest of Mexico
Promise to join §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! when [Root.GetSheHe] starts a war to reconquer parts of Mexico.

For as long as have ruled these lands, we have entrusted the raising of our children to Rustfolk nursemaids. Our first words would not be French but those of our servants. As we grew up we learned to speak a tongue that was neither one nor the other. Though those back in Quebec mock our accent, our tongue, calling it “Rouillé” - Rusted, we bear it with pride.
It is our tongue
column3: Oui, ne faisons qu'un avec nos serfs !
column4: Jawohl, lasst uns eins mit unseren Leibeigenen sein
column6: Sí, seamos uno con nuestros vasallos

column2: Around our lands more people are using this Rouillard language and I find this is a perfect means for a Seigneur to get his Rustfolk serfs to work properly. We continue to use our own influence to promote this means of communication in the interests of a more efficient realm.
We are indeed wise
column3: Nous sommes habiles.
column4: Oh, was sind wir weise
column6: Sin duda somos sabios

column2: Although every civilized man knows that French is the true language of civilization, this Rouillard language does have a certain base functionality. I have therefore prevailed upon a member of my court to adopt this for everyday administrative use.
A most useful development
column3: Une évolution très utile.
column4: Eine höchst nützliche Entwicklung
column6: Un avance muy útil

column2: I was considering important business when I had an amazing insight. To strengthen my realm I must bring my vassals round to my way of thinking. This involves communication. If I can get them to communicate like me then I will have a much smoother running realm.
column3: Je réfléchissais à une affaire importante lorsque j'ai eu une idée étonnante. Pour renforcer mon Royaume, je dois convertir mes vassaux à ma façon de penser. Cela passe par la communication. Si je parviens à leur faire adopter mon mode de communication, mon Royaume fonctionnera beaucoup mieux.
column4: Beim Nachdenken über ein wichtiges Geschäft kam ich zu einer erstaunlichen Einsicht: Zur Stärkung meines Reichs muss ich meine Vasallen von meiner Denkweise überzeugen, und dazu gehört auch die Kommunikation. Wenn ich es schaffen könnte, dass alle wie ich kommunizieren, so wäre mein Reich viel einfacher zu regieren.
column6: Estaba ocupado con asuntos importantes cuando tuve una súbita revelación. Para reforzar mi reino debo lograr que mis vasallos compartan mi forma de pensar. Eso implica comunicación. Si logro que se comuniquen como yo mi reino funcionará mucho mejor.

column2: Sometimes I even surprise myself
column3: Parfois, je m'étonne moi-même.
column4: Manchmal überrasche ich mich selbst
column6: A veces me sorprendo a mí mismo

column2: My liege has persuaded me to embrace this Rouillard tongue that is sweeping the realm.
Anyone want some paczki?

For as long as have ruled these lands, we have entrusted the raising of our children to Rustfolk nursemaids. Our first words would not be French but those of our servants. As we grew up we learned to speak a tongue that was neither one nor the other. Though those back in Quebec mock our accent, our tongue, calling it “Rouillé” - Rusted, we bear it with pride.
It is our tongue

column2: The time has come to dedicate myself wholly to the mother goddess Kali.
Praise Kali!
As a Kalist, you must dedicate yourself to Kali.
Georgia Guidestones

I am uncertain about my future and I cannot stop worrying about the life of my unborn child. Perhaps I should make a vow to the Holy Spirit, and pray to ease my tribulations and help me give birth to a strong and healthy child.
§GGrants access to the Ivy League§!

There are many deities whom you may chose to honor. Will it be the Serpentine God, the cunning ruler of the afterlife? Or perhaps the Burning Bush, the arbiter of divine fury? The Light, the wise spirit of the divine, and the White Lamb, giver of mercy, also possess great powers.
Hallowed be the Serpentine God. No one can outwit him!
I put my faith in the Burning Bush. May he guide me in righteous fury!
May the Light shine his infinite wisdom on me!
The White Lamb shall guide my words and thoughts.

The wise and sly Serpentine God is the ruler of Eden, where all of us will end up one day. His realm is wet and lush, filled with every type of food and comfort imaginable. The Serpentine God's chosen devote their life to carrying out his desires in this world, with the hopes of a glorious afterlife in the next.

The Burning Bush appears to those in times of trial, signalling that the time has come to embrace righteous fury and challenge one's oppressors. However, adherents must be careful, or the flames of anger may end up destroying them as well...

The Light is said to be the source of all true wisdom in this world. Those who embrace his warmth and presence may sometimes "shine" with his light, giving them insights far beyond normal understanding.

The White Lamb is the most merciful deity of Revelationism, capable of forgiving even those who have committed heinous crimes. As a result, he is particularly popular with pentient sinners, and his adherents are known for their great patience. Some call them naive, but is it not better to be naive than cruel?

There are many deities whom I can choose to follow. Will it be fiery Lionza, Goddess of Nature? Perhaps the cacique Guaicaipuro, master of unconventional tactics? On the other hand, if I care for diplomacy as well as warfare, I could turn to the noble Felipe...
It shall be Maria Lionza. May the mother protect me.
Strong and mighty Guaicaipuro, I will do battle in your name!
I will dedicate my prayers to Felipe to give me guidance and wisdom.

There are many deities whom I can chose to follow. Will I seek vitality and health by praying to José Gregorio, or curry the favor of the poet Bello? Yet, if I wish to achieve true greatness and to be remembered for all time, perhaps I should look at Bolivar for guidance.
I will dedicate my prayers to José Gregorio to give me guidance and wisdom.
Bello will guide my words and my heart.
Bolivar will guide me to victory!

The mystical goddess Maria Lionza is the mother and founder of her people of Venezuela. She is said to have reigned over the savage beasts, a demonstration of her power as the Queen of Nature. She accepts any sacrifice and whoever pays her tribute, she shares her wisdom and power with him.

Guaicaipuro, the legendary ancient cacique, is said to have been the master of unconventional warfare. When foreign occupiers came to his land, he united all the tribes of Caracas and struck fear into the hearts of the occupiers by attacking from the shadows and without warning. The attackers were forced to resort to trickery to defeat him, but Guaicaipuro nevertheless ascended to godhood.

The soldier Felipe is said to have been a retainer of the legendary Simon Bolivar. According to legend, Bolivar was able to form many alliances in part because of Felipe's great diplomatic ability. Felipe was tragically murdered by the oppressors of Venezuela, but he will still protect his faithful from their enemies.

José Gregorio is remembered as quite possibly the greatest doctor who ever lived. He saved countless lives with his skill, and his kindness and humility were second to none. Upon his death, he became a divine protector of the sick and incapable.

Bello is said to have been the tutor of Simon Bolivar, and an accomplished poet and diplomat in his own right. It is said that he helps guide diplomats and other wordsmiths if they encounter difficulty in their craft.

Simon Bolivar is one of the most legendary figures in all of Latin American history and one of the greatest warriors who ever lived. Reverence of him transcends religious barriers, making him the one figure who unites all of northern South America. This is rather fitting, giving the feats he accomplished in life.

There are many deities whom you can chose to follow. The Almighty Spirit, God of the West and the ruler of the Frontier, or his servant Sacagewea, the great mother and goddess of all families. Perhaps you will pray to Missus Sureshot, Mistress of the Hunt. You may also dedicate your worship to the nameless stoic deity...
Almighty Spirit, I shall serve you faithfully.
My prayers go to bountiful Sacagewea.
I will bring you honor, Missus Sureshot!
Oh great Nameless, share the secrets of death with me!

The domain of the Almighty Spirit is the great Range. He governs both the natural and supernatural worlds, having created the former and conquered the latter. It is said that the lightning that sometimes crosses the sky and tornadoes that cross the ground are manifestations of his wrath.

Sacagewea, Goddess of the family, is a gentle yet powerful mistress. She cares for all of her children, although especially mothers and infants. It is sometimes said that the lullabies she sang to her children can be heard in streams and rivers.

The woods are ruled by Missus Sureshot, Goddess of the Hunt. Those who pledge their allegiance to her shall always be blessed with true aim and strength of body. It is said that the Almighty Spirit was so impressed with her that he allowed her to use his lightning, making her capable of yet more impressive feats.

Those who worship the Nameless has chosen a stoic and silent Master. While he may sometimes share secrets about life and death, he may just as quickly turn his back on you for falling short of his obscure standards. However, if you keep your wits about you, the Nameless's lessons shall bring you power and influence beyond comprehension.

There are two main deities whom you can chose to follow. You can choose to follow the Tuatha, the traditional gods of Druidism, or the mother Nokomis, whose popularity has grown more and more over the centuries.
I shall serve the Tuatha faithfully.
I shall follow Nokomis.

The Tuatha is the tribe to which most of the Gods and Goddessess belong to. They have created all that which is good and wonderful in this world, including us. Their rule is one of peace and understanding, and those are their gifts to faithful followers.

Nokomis, or Grandmother, is a relatively newer addition to the Druidic pantheon, albeit one who has been embraced with open arms by all Druidics. It is said that she was the mother or grandmother of many of the greatest gods and goddesses outside of the Tuatha.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of the White Lamb. In his name you have promote peace and understanding between your subjects. As a result, your diplomatic skills have been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Bello. In his name you have promote peace and understanding between your subjects. As a result, your diplomatic skills have been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of the Tuatha. In their name you have promote peace and understanding between your subjects. As a result, your diplomatic skills have been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Bolivar. In his name you have practiced your axemanship and spent many hours strategizing at the war table with your commanders. As a result, your martial skills have been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Felipe. In his name you have practiced your axemanship and spent many hours strategizing at the war table with your commanders. As a result, your martial skills have been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Missus Sureshot. In her name you have arranged a number grand hunts as well as spent many solitary hours tracking in the wilderness. As a result, your martial skills have been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Guaicaipuro. In his name you have practiced your spear throwing and spent many hours strategizing at the war hut with your commanders. As a result, your martial skills have been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of the Burning Bush. In his name you have practiced your spear throwing and spent many hours strategizing at the war hut with your commanders. As a result, your martial skills have been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Lionza. In her name you have arranged harvest festivals and fertility rites, as well as spent many hours inspecting the fields of [Root.Capital.GetName]. As a result, your stewardship skills have been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Sacagewea. In her name you have arranged harvest festivals and fertility rites, as well as spent many hours inspecting the fields of [Root.Capital.GetName]. As a result, your stewardship skills have been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Jarilo. In his name you have arranged harvest festivals and fertility rites, as well as spent many hours inspecting the fields of [Root.Capital.GetName]. As a result, your stewardship skills have been improving.
column3: Vous avez travaillé dur et avec dévotion dans votre tentative de suivre le chemin d'Yarilo. En son nom, vous avez organisé des fêtes des récoltes et des rites de fertilité, ainsi que passé de nombreuses heures à inspecter les champs à [Root.Capital.GetName]. En conséquence, vos compétences en intendance se sont améliorées.
column4: Ihr habt fromm danach gestrebt, dem Weg von Jarilo zu folgen. In seinem Namen habt Ihr Erntefestivals und Fruchtbarkeitsriten organisiert und viele Stunden darauf verbraucht, die Felder von [Root.Capital.GetName] zu begutachten. Daher haben sich Eure Verwaltungskünste verbessert.
column6: Te has esforzado devotamente en tu empeño por seguir la senda de Jarilo. En su nombre, has organizado festivales de la cosecha y ritos de fertilidad y pasado muchas horas inspeccionando los campos de [Root.Capital.GetName]. Como resultado, tus habilidades administrativas han mejorado.

column2: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of the Serpentine God. In his name you have sought out knowledge and secrets, both in the earthly realm and in his domain, the dream lands. As a result, your learning has been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of the Nameless. In his name you have sought out knowledge and secrets, both in the earthly realm and in his domain, the dream lands. As a result, your learning has been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of the Almighty Spirit. In his name you have sought out knowledge and secrets, both in the earthly realm and in his domain, the dream lands. As a result, your learning has been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of The Light. In its name you have sought out knowledge and purity, as well as taught and done good deeds wherever your travels have taken you. As a result, your learning has been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of José Gregorio. In his name you have sought out knowledge and purity, as well as taught and done good deeds wherever your travels have taken you. As a result, your learning has been improving.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Nokomis. In her name you have sought out knowledge and purity, as well as taught and done good deeds wherever your travels have taken you. As a result, your learning has been improving.

When you needed an accomplice in a small scheme, [From.GetTitledFirstName] proved to be an unexpected ally. Think what mutual benefits can do to unite two souls! While it was pure business at first, it turns out you have plenty in common, such as your reverence of the Serpentine God. Now you spend more time conversing than plotting...

It is a fine day and you are out hunting with a small party. As you take a break to eat your midday meal, you find yourself in a discussion on archery with [From.GetTitledFirstName]. It turns out that [From.GetSheHe] is also a devout follower of the Burning Bush. The longer you talk the more you seem to have in common!

It is early morning and you are at the shrine dedicated to The Light, deep in prayers. You hear soft footsteps behind you - who could it be at this hour? [From.GetTitledFirstName], as it turns out. You exchange some pleasantries and soon you find yourself in a full-fledged conversation. You have so much in common!

It is early morning and you are at the shrine dedicated to the White Lamb, deep in prayers. You hear soft footsteps behind you - who could it be at this hour? [From.GetTitledFirstName], as it turns out. You exchange some pleasantries and soon you find yourself in a full-fledged conversation. You have so much in common!

Many find it odd that a [Root.GetTitle] works in the fields, but tending to the land and crops make you feel closer to Maria Lionza, more so than any prayer. As you take a short break, you notice [From.GetTitledFirstName] approaching. You greet and exchange some words about the harvest. It turns out that [From.GetSheHe] is also a follower of Maria Lionza!

While it was pure business at first, it turns out you have plenty in common, such as your reverence of the Nameless. Now you spend more time conversing than plotting...

You exchange some pleasantries and soon you find yourself in a full-fledged conversation. You have so much in common!

You exchange some pleasantries and soon you find yourself in a full-fledged conversation. You have so much in common!

You sit huddled up together by the fire, the air thick with tension. The skies outside are dark with heavy clouds and the Burning Bush's presence is as tangible as the rain smattering on the roof. Suddenly, the room is lit by a bright flash and an ear-deafening crack cuts through the silence. Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] breaks into tears.

You sit huddled up together by the fire, the air thick with tension. The skies outside are dark with heavy clouds and the Almighty Spirit's presence is as tangible as the rain smattering on the roof. Suddenly, the room is lit by a bright flash and an ear-deafening crack cuts through the silence. Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] breaks into tears.

You are dancing at the fertility rite held in Maria Lionza's honor as your eyes find [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s across the bonfire. For a moment, it is as if the whole world turns silent. The drumming is a distant thunder, yet the rhythmic vibrations run through your body, to your very core...
Tonight, I shall bed [From.GetFirstName] in the name of Maria Lionza.

Lately, you have striven to act in the spirit of Nokomis by treating your [From.GetHusbandWife] [From.GetTitledFirstName] with respect and warmth. Slowly it has changed the dynamic of your relationship, and those who are closest to you have noticed it as well.

Lately, you have striven to act in the spirit of Sacagewea by treating your [From.GetHusbandWife] [From.GetTitledFirstName] with respect and warmth. Slowly it has changed the dynamic of your relationship, and those who are closest to you have noticed it as well.
The bird is in with the Nameless now, dearest [From.GetFirstName].
The Nameless is a relentless master. Death awaits us all.
[From.GetFirstName] will become an excellent disciple of Bolivar one day!
[From.GetFirstName] will become an excellent disciple of Maria Lionza one day!
[From.GetFirstName] will become an excellent disciple of Missus Sureshot one day!

Your reputation as a devout follower of Bolivar has spread across the lands. Many great and seasoned warriors have since traveled to [Root.Capital.GetName] to pledge their allegiance to your cause.
Your reputation as a devout follower of Felipe has spread across the lands. Many great and seasoned warriors have since traveled to [Root.Capital.GetName] to pledge their allegiance to your cause.

Your reputation as a devout follower of the Burning Bush has spread across the lands. Many great and seasoned warriors have since traveled to [Root.Capital.GetName] to pledge their allegiance to your cause.

In your efforts to become more like the White Lamb, you have begun treating everyone who crosses your path with more understanding and respect. As a result, you have become known for your compassionate ways and noble nature. Some go as far as calling you "the Voice of the White Lamb".

In your efforts to become more like Bello, you have begun treating everyone who crosses your path with more understanding and respect. As a result, you have become known for your compassionate ways and noble nature. Some go as far as calling you "the Voice of Bello".

In your efforts to become more like the Tuatha, you have begun treating everyone who crosses your path with more understanding and respect. As a result, you have become known for your compassionate ways and noble nature. Some go as far as calling you "the Voice of the Tuatha".

Your efforts to make the most out Maria Lionza's holy soil has turned you into a true inspiration for your people. Their hard work, in combination with the fair weather which the Goddess has blessed you with, has resulted in the richest harvest in many years. Celebrations in Maria Lionza's honor is held in every village.

Your efforts to make the most out Sacagewea's holy soil has turned you into a true inspiration for your people. Their hard work, in combination with the fair weather which the Goddess has blessed you with, has resulted in the richest harvest in many years. Celebrations in Sacagewea's honor is held in every village.

Following in the footsteps of the Serpentine God has brought you down many paths you would never otherwise tread. The things one can overhear during such journeys often prove valuable, indeed. Just recently you discovered that [god_plotter.GetTitledFirstName] is plotting against none other than yourself!

Following in the footsteps of the Nameless has brought you down many paths you would never otherwise tread. The things one can overhear during such journeys often prove valuable, indeed. Just recently you discovered that [god_plotter.GetTitledFirstName] is plotting against none other than yourself!

In your search for wisdom in the name of The Light, you have had more than one epiphany relevant to welfare of your lands. Spreading that knowledge is not only beneficial to your rule, but also a sacred duty in and of itself.

In your search for wisdom in the name of José Gregorio, you have had more than one epiphany relevant to welfare of your lands. Spreading that knowledge is not only beneficial to your rule, but also a sacred duty in and of itself.

In your search for wisdom in the name of the Almighty Spirit, you have had more than one epiphany relevant to welfare of your lands. Spreading that knowledge is not only beneficial to your rule, but also a sacred duty in and of itself.

In your search for wisdom in the name of Nokomis, you have had more than one epiphany relevant to welfare of your lands. Spreading that knowledge is not only beneficial to your rule, but also a sacred duty in and of itself.

I shall erect a monument in the honor of the Burning Bush.

To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in the Serpentine God's honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].

Follower of the Serpentine God
This character is a devout follower of the Serpentine God, the Revelationist ruler of the afterlife. He is also associated with cunning and knowledge.
Follower of the Burning Bush
This character is a devout follower of the Burning Bush, the Revelationist god of righteous fury. He is also associated with fire, lightning, and warfare.
Follower of The Light
This character is a devout follower of The Light, the Revelationist god of divine insight. He is also associated with visions, prophecy, and wisdom.
Follower of the White Lamb
This character is a devout follower of the White Lamb, the Revelationist god of mercy. He is also associated with patience, justice, and kindness.
Follower of Maria Lionza
This character is a devout follower of Maria Lionza, the first of the Tres Potencias. She is associated with fertility, nature, and harmony.
Follower of Guaicaipuro
This character is a devout follower of Guaicaipuro, the most warlike of the Tres Potencias. He is associated with unconventional tactics, liberation, and righteous fury.
Follower of Felipe
This character is a devout follower of Felipe, the most diplomatic of the Tres Potencias. He is associated with alliances and treaties.
Follower of José Gregorio
This character is a devout follower of José Gregorio, the Tres Potencias god of healing. He is also associated with life, medicine, and, in a sense, death.
Follower of Bello
This character is a devout follower of Bello, the Tres Potencias god of poetry. He is also associated with philosophy, legalism, and education.
Follower of Bolivar
This character is a devout follower of Simon Bolivar, the Tres Potencias god of liberation. He is also associated with ambition, justice, and glory.
Follower of the Almighty Spirit
This character is a devout follower of the Almighty Spirit, the highest god in the Trailwalker pantheon. He is associated with wisdom, righteous fury, and lightning.
Follower of Sacagewea
This character is a devout follower of Sacagewea, the Trailwalker goddess of the family. She is also associated with trade, fertility, and agriculture.
Follower of Missus Sureshot
This character is a devout follower of Missus Sureshot, the Trailwalker goddess of archery and hunting. She is also associated with warfare, showmanship, and sporting.
Follower of the Nameless
This character is a devout follower of the Nameless, the Trailwalker god of justice. He is also associated with death, stoicism, and cunning.
Follower of the Tuatha
This character is a devout follower of the Tuatha, the traditional pantheon of the Druidic faith. They are associated with diplomacy.
Follower of Nokomis
This character is a devout follower of Nokomis, the divine grandmother of the expanded Druidic pantheon. She is associated with wisdom and fertility.
Voice of the White Lamb
It is well known that this character possesses the compassion and dignity of the White Lamb.
Voice of Bello
It is well known that this character possesses the compassion and dignity of Bello.
Voice of the Tuatha
It is well known that this character possesses the compassion and dignity of the Tuatha.
Nokomis' Blessing
This character feels blessed by the Goddess Nokomis, which has improved their marriage.
Sacagewea's Blessing
This character feels blessed by the Goddess Sacagewea, which has improved their marriage.
The [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] will hear our plea for salvation.
No Characters
While many struggle to see why [Religion.GetHighGodName] decided to take a young child away from us, we hope [GetFirstName] will find peace in the afterlife
column3: Tandis que nous cherchons à savoir pourquoi [Get_le_HighGod] a décidé de nous prendre un[Get_E] enfant, nous espérons que [GetFirstName] trouvera la paix dans l'au-delà.
column4: Auch wenn viele nicht verstehen können, warum [Religion.GetHighGodName] beschlossen hat, ein kleines Kind zu nehmen, hoffen wir, dass [GetFirstName] im Jenseits Frieden findet
column6: Mientras muchos se esfuerzan en entender por qué [Religion.GetHighGodName] decidió llevarse de nuestro lado un niño tan pequeño, esperamos que [GetFirstName] encuentre la paz en la otra vida

I shall follow the Kalist tradition.

column2: The Mictlantecs have sacrificed [From.GetTitledName] to their demon gods! After bringing [From.GetHerHim] to one of their new temple pyramids, their wicked priests placed [From.GetFirstName] on an altar and sliced [From.GetHerHim] open with a ceremonial dagger. They then tore out [From.GetHerHis] still beating heart to the cheers of their assembled warriors.
Has NOT recently used §YCall of the Plains§!

[saint_person.GetDynName] lived a pious life, truly following the example of [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName]. [saint_person.GetSheHeCap] passed on [saint_person.GetDeathDate], and people have long wondered if [saint_person.GetSheHe] would be considered a true [saint_person.Religion.GetGroupName] or not.

A large ceremony is held in [saint_person.GetFirstName]'s honor by the [saint_person.GetProperReligiousHead], to celebrate the life [saint_person.GetSheHe] lived. A virtuous exemplar of a true [saint_person.Religion.GetName], the [saint_person.GetProperReligiousHead] will write [saint_person.GetHerHis] name in among the pious [saint_person.Religion.GetGroupName]s of old.

A bastion of piety in life, a stalwart example in death. Blessed be [saint_person.GetHerHis] memory, once again in the arms of [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName].
$NAME$ Bishops may pay tax to the $HEAD_TITLE$ rather than their secular liege

After each hunt you make sure to leave an offering for Missus Sureshot in thanks of their great generosity. She surely must be pleased, for you have noticed that nowadays your arrows find their targets more often than they once did. You have been blessed with strength and a deadly aim.
May the Huntress guide my arrows.
The Reformable Great Holy War Era has Begun\n

In response to the new era of Crusades, the Great [Root.GetTitledName] has informed all [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s of [Root.GetPossPronoun] plans for a magnificent [Root.Religion.GetName] response. In fact, all heads of reformed religions may now declare Great Holy Wars. This could be the beginning of unprecedented Heathen aggression.
The Consumerist Prophet is Dead\n
The realm is not to be ruled by a child
Thor, hear my call!
column3: Odin, entendez mon appel !
column4: Odin, erhöre mein Rufen!
column6: ¡Odín escuchará mi petición!

column2: By winning great victories for the Norse faith this character is assured a place at Thor's table in Valhalla!
column3: En remportant de grandes victoires pour la foi scandinave, ce personnage s'est assuré d'avoir une place à la table d'Odin à Valhalla !
column4: Durch ihre großen Siege im Namen des nordischen Glaubens ist dieser Person ein Platz an Odins Tafel in Walhalla sicher!
column6: ¡Al ganar grandes victorias para la fe nórdica, este personaje tiene garantizado un lugar en la mesa de Odín en el Valhalla!

column2: Daughter of Thor
column3: Fille d'Odin
column4: Tochter von Odin
column6: El [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName] que declaró [From.GetDynName] ha terminado en derrota al no lograr sus ejércitos conquistar [Root.GetName].

column2: Son of Thor
column3: Fils d'Odin
column4: Sohn von Odin
column6: Hija de Odín

column2: The priests you have sent to [converting_king.Capital.GetName] return home exhausted and satisfied. \nThe people of [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have fully embraced their new gods. Their warriors will surely make a fine addition to Thor's army in Valhalla. \nWith your actions you have gained another ally in the eternal fight against the dead gods.
column3: Les prêtres que vous avez envoyés à [converting_king.Capital.GetName] rentrent chez eux épuisés et satisfaits.\nLe peuple [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.Get_du_Realm] a pleinement embrassé ses nouveaux dieux. Leurs guerriers feront sûrement un bel ajout à l'armée d'Odin au Valhalla pour la dernière guerre.\nPar vos actions, vous avez gagné un autre allié dans le combat éternel contre les messagers de la fin des temps.
column4: Die Priester, die Ihr nach [converting_king.Capital.GetName] entsendet habt, kehren erschöpft aber zufrieden nach Hause zurück.\nDas Volk von [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] hat due neuen Götter vollständig akzeptiert. Seine Krieger werden Odins Armee in Walhalla sicher eine gute Ergänzung für den letzten Krieg sein.\nMit Eurer Handlung habt ihr einen weiteren Verbündeten im ewigen Kampf gegen die Bringer der Endzeit gewonnen.
column6: Los sacerdotes que enviaste a [converting_king.Capital.GetName] regresan cansados y satisfechos.\nEl pueblo de [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] ha abrazado totalmente los nuevo dioses. Sus guerreros serán una gran incorporación a los guerreros de Odín en el Valhala cuando llegue la batalla final. \nCon tus acciones has ganado otro aliado en la lucha eterna contra los portadores del fin de los tiempos.

column2: You inform your men that The Grey Wanderer has visited them.
column3: Vous informez vos hommes que ce vagabond n'était autre qu'Odin.
column4: Ihr glaubt, dass der Wanderer Odin war.
column6: Informas a tus hombres que el viajero no era ni más ni menos que Odín

column2: You urge your horse forth to seek the Wanderer's treasure with your fellow hunters in pursuit.
column3: Vous partez à cheval à la recherche du trésor divin, avec vos compagnons chasseurs qui vous talonnent.
column4: Ihr treibt Euer Pferd vorwärts, dem Schatz des Gottes entgegen, gefolgt von Euren treuen Jagdbegleitern.
column6: Montas tu caballo para buscar el tesoro del Dios liderando tu fiel equipo de cazadores.

column2: You ignore your mens' insistence that the stranger was the Wanderer.
column3: Vous ignorez vos hommes qui affirment que c'était Alföðr, le Père de tout.
column4: Das soll der Allvater gewesen sein? Wohl kaum!
column6: Ignoras la insistencia de tus hombres acerca de que el extraño era el Señor de los Dioses

column2: You carry on with your hunt.
column3: Vous poursuivez la chasse.
column4: Ihr setzt Eure Jagd fort.
column6: Continuas con la caza.

column2: You scold your men for believing in the Gods.
column3: Vous réprimandez vos hommes pour croire aux dieux.
column4: Ihr scheltet Eure Männer für ihren Glauben an die Götter.
column6: Reprendes a tus hombres por creer en los Dioses

column2: After all, what have they done for you?
column3: Après tout, qu'ont-ils fait pour vous ?
column4: Was haben sie schließlich schon für euch getan?
column6: Después de todo, ¿Qué han hecho por ti?

column2: The Forsetate

A Forseti of the Norse faith is expected to uphold certain standards of morality and strength. But we are only human after all, and as long as people aren't aware of your vices and faults it's not a problem. However, it seems you've been slipping in discretion lately - gossip is starting to spread, and there are murmurings all over the Norse world about your unworthy traits and habits.
column3: On attend d'un fylkir nordique qu'il fasse preuve de moralité et de force. Mais nous ne sommes que des humains après tout, et tant que personne n'est au courant de nos vices, il n'y a pas de problème. Cependant, il semble que vous ayez manqué de discrétion ces derniers temps, et des rumeurs commencent à se répandre. On murmure dans tout le monde nordique au sujet de vos habitudes indignes.
column4: Von einem Fylkir des nordischen Glaubens erwartet man ein bestimmtes Maß an Moralität und geistiger Stärke. Trotzdem sind wir alle Menschen und solange niemand über Eure Laster und Fehler Bescheid weiß, ist dies auch unproblematisch. Allerdings habt Ihr in letzter Zeit die nötige Diskretion vermissen lassen. In weiten Teilen der nordischen Welt tuschelt man bereits über Eure lasterhaften Taten.
column6: Se espera que un Fylkir de la fe nórdica observe ciertas normas de moralidad y firmeza. Pero, después de todo, sólo somos humanos y mientras la gente no conozca vuestros vicios y fallos, no es un problema. No obstante, parece que últimamente no habéis sido muy discreto. Los chismorreos se extienden y hay rumores en todo el mundo nórdico acerca de vuestros hábitos y cualidades indignos.

column2: I am proud to bring honor to the Tuatha.
column3: Je suis fi[Root.GetErEre] de faire honneur à Dievas.
column4: Ich bin stolz darauf, Dievas zu ehren
column6: Es un orgullo honrar a Dievas.

column2: I am proud to bring honor to Nokomis.
column3: Je suis fi[Root.GetErEre] de faire honneur à la Déesse.
column4: Ich bin stolz darauf, die Göttin zu ehren.
column6: Es un orgullo honrar a la diosa.

column2: [From.GetTitledName] has decided to hold a great Furusiyya martial competition, and has sent invitations out to warriors across the land.
column3: [From.Get_Le_TitledName] a décidé d'organiser une Furûsiyya, un grand tournoi martial, et a envoyé des invitations à tous les guerriers des environs.
column4: [From.GetTitledName] hat sich entschieden, einen großen Furusiyya, einen kriegerischen Wettbewerb, zu veranstalten, und hat Einladungen an Krieger im ganzen Land verschickt.
column6: [From.GetTitledName] ha decidido celebrar una gran competición marcial de Furusiyya y ha invitado a los guerreros del país.

column2: [From.GetTitledName] has been declared as the winner of a great Furusiyya martial competition!
column3: [From.Get_Le_TitledName] a été déclaré grand vainqueur du grand tournoi martial !
column4: [From.GetTitledName] wurde zum Gewinner des großen Furusiyya, einem kriegerischen Wettbewerb, ernannt!
column6: ¡[From.GetTitledName] ha sido el ganador de una gran competición marcial de Furusiyya!

column2: [From.GetTitledName] has been declared the second champion of a great Furusiyya martial competition!
column3: [From.Get_Le_TitledName] a été déclaré deuxième champion du grand tournoi martial !
column4: [From.GetTitledName] wurde zum zweiten Sieger des großen Furusiyya, einem kriegerischen Wettbewerb, ernannt!
column6: ¡[From.GetTitledName] ha sido el segundo ganador de una gran competición marcial de Furusiyya!

column2: [From.GetTitledName] has won third place in a great Furusiyya martial competition!
column3: [From.Get_Le_TitledName] décroche la troisième place du grand tournoi martial !
column4: [From.GetTitledName] hat den dritten Platz in einem großen Furusiyya, einem kriegerischen Wettbewerb, belegt!
column6: ¡[From.GetTitledName] ha sido el tercer ganador de una gran competición marcial de Furusiyya!

column2: the pox
The many blisters on your body have faded, almost all of them gone now. So much for the Pox.
[From.GetTitledName] is worried that you may be developing the Pox. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
column3: [From.Get_Le_TitledName] s'inquiète que vous puissiez avoir contracté la petite vérole. [From.GetIlElleCap] insiste pour que vous suiviez ses instructions.
column4: [From.GetTitledName] befürchtet, dass Ihr Anzeichen von Blattern zeigen könntet. [From.GetSheHeCap] gibt Euch Anweisungen und besteht darauf, dass Ihr sie befolgt.
column6: [From.GetTitledName] está bastante segur[From.GetOA] que has contraído la Viruela. Insiste que sigas sus instrucciones.

column2: [From.GetTitledName] is worried that your rein may be at an end, as you seem to be developing the Pox. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
column3: [From.Get_Le_TitledName] s'inquiète que vous puissiez avoir contracté la petite vérole. [From.GetIlElleCap] insiste pour que vous suiviez ses instructions.
column4: [From.GetTitledName] hofft, nicht aufs falsche Pferd gesetzt zu haben, befürchtet aber, dass Ihr Anzeichen von Blattern zeigt. [From.GetSheHeCap] gibt Euch Anweisungen und besteht darauf, dass Ihr sie befolgt.
column6: [From.GetTitledName] está bastante segur[From.GetOA] que has contraído la Viruela, una enfermedad que puede provocar un estado mental alterado. [From.GetElEllaCap] hace una pausa para sacudirse la crin, y pisar el suelo con sus cascos antes de advertirte que estés atento a señales de delirio. [From.GetTitledName] insiste que relinches que seguirás sus instrucciones.

column2: [From.GetTitledName] states that [From.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [From.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you are developing the Pox. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
column3: [From.Get_Le_TitledName] affirme que sa vaste expérience l'amène à la certitude que vous avez la variole. [From.GetIlElleCap] insiste pour que vous suiviez ses instructions.
column4: [From.GetTitledName] ist sich aufgrund langjähriger medizinischer Erfahrung absolut sicher, dass Ihr Anzeichen von Blattern zeigt. [From.GetSheHeCap] gibt Euch Anweisungen und besteht darauf, dass Ihr sie befolgt.
column6: [From.GetTitledName] expone que su amplia experiencia médica le lleva a la conclusión de que has contraído la Viruela. Insiste que sigas sus instrucciones.

column2: [From.GetTitledName] is worried that you are developing the Pox. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
column3: [From.Get_Le_TitledName] craint que vous n'ayez la petite vérole. [From.GetIlElleCap] insiste pour que vous suiviez ses instructions.
column4: [From.GetTitledName] befürchtet, dass Ihr Anzeichen von Blattern zeigt. [From.GetSheHeCap] gibt Euch Anweisungen und besteht darauf, dass Ihr sie befolgt.
column6: [From.GetTitledName] está segur[From.GetOA] que has contraído la Viruela. Insiste que sigas sus instrucciones.

column2: [From.GetTitledName] reckons that you are may be developing the Pox, which is probably not too bad since it originally came from chickens. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [From.GetHerHis] instructions.
column3: [From.Get_Le_TitledName] croit que vous avez la petite vérole, ce qui n'est probablement pas grave, puisque c'est la « petite ». [From.GetIlElleCap] insiste pour que vous suiviez ses instructions.
column4: [From.GetTitledName] schätzt, dass Ihr Anzeichen von Blattern zeigen könntet, was aber vermutlich kein Grund zur Sorge sein sollte. [From.GetSheHeCap] gibt Euch Anweisungen und besteht darauf, dass Ihr sie befolgt.
column6: [From.GetTitledName] sugiere dudos[From.GetOA] que puede que hayas contraído la Viruela, lo que no será demasiado grave porque es pequeña. Insiste que sigas sus instrucciones.

column2: Yesterday lesions appeared on your face and swiftly spread across your body. Now they have turned to red blisters filled with pus. You have contracted the Pox.
column3: Hier des lésions sont apparues sur votre visage et rapidement sur tout le corps. À présent, elles ont évolué en cloques remplies de pus. Vous avez contracté la variole.
column4: Gestern erschienen Flecken auf Eurem Gesicht, die sich rasch über Euren Körper ausbreiteten und sich zu eitergefüllten Pusteln entwickelten. Ihr habt die Blattern.
column6: Ayer aparecieron lesiones en tu cara y rápidamente se extendieron por todo el cuerpo. Ahora se han convertido en ampollas llenas de pus. Has contraído la Viruela.

column2: Pox
column3: Variole
column4: Blattern
column6: Viruela

column2: These are dark days. My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been beset by oozing lesions and a high fever. I have just been informed that [From.GetHerHis] affliction is indeed the Pox.
column3: Les temps sont durs. M[From.GetOnA] [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] a eu des lésions suintantes et une forte fièvre. Je viens juste d'être informé que son affliction est en fait la variole.
column4: Dies sind finstere Tage. Mein [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] wird von nässenden Wunden und hohem Fieber gepeinigt. Ich habe gerade erfahren, dass es sich bei [From.GetHerHis]er Krankheit fürwahr um die Pocken handelt.
column6: Son días oscuros. Mi [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], sufre escaras supurantes y una grave fiebre. Acaban de informarme que su enfermedad es claramente la viruela.

column2: These are dark days. My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been beset by oozing lesions and a high fever. I have just been informed that [From.GetHerHis] affliction is indeed the Pox.
column3: Les temps sont durs. M[From.GetOnA] [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] a eu des lésions suintantes et une forte fièvre. Je viens juste d'être informé que son affliction est en fait la variole.
column4: Dies sind finstere Tage. Mein [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] wird von nässenden Wunden und hohem Fieber gepeinigt. Ich habe gerade erfahren, dass es sich bei [From.GetHerHis]er Krankheit fürwahr um die Pocken handelt.
column6: Son días oscuros. Mi [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], sufre escaras supurantes y una grave fiebre. Acaban de informarme que su enfermedad es claramente la viruela.

column2: Pox
column3: Variole
column4: Blattern
column6: Viruela

column2: The Pox has struck this county, killing almost half of those infected.
column3: La variole a frappé ce comté, tuant près de la moitié des personnes infectées.
column4: Dieses Land wurde von einer Blatternepidemie getroffen. Fast die Hälfte der Infizierten sind gestorben.
column6: La viruela ha golpeado este país matando a casi la mitad de los infectados.

column2: of the Pox
column3: de la variole
column4: an Pocken
column6: de la viruela

column2: This room inside the palace is a cartographer's dream, and contains priceless maps of all sorts. Some are claimed to date back to the ancient pre-fall era, and others, whose accuracy cannot be gauged with any certainty, depict strange lands far across the oceans.
column3: Cette salle à l'intérieur du palais est le rêve de tout cartographe : elle contient de précieuses cartes maritimes en tous genres. Certaines dateraient de l'époque de la Grèce antique. D'autres, dont la précision ne peut être évaluée avec certitude, dépeignent d'étranges contrées du lointain Orient.
column4: Dieser Raum im Innern des Palastes ist der Traum eines jeden Kartographen und enthält unbezahlbare Karten aller Art. Manche sollen bis zu den alten Griechen zurückgehen, und andere, deren Genauigkeit nicht genau beurteilt werden kann, stellen fremde Länder aus dem fernen Osten dar.
column6: Esta sala dentro del palacio es el sueño de un cartógrafo, contiene todo tipo de mapas. Algunos se supone que provienen de los antiguos griegos, y otros, cuya verosimilitud no puede medirse de ningún modo, describen extrañas tierras del lejano oriente.

column2: We can still do much good, God willing.
